name: AAA Clock 2: Color Set 2
description:
Add more colors to your clock with the new AAA Clock 2 DLC.
Choose dark blue, orange or cyan.

name: Just Passing Chapter 2
description: The 2nd part to the "Just passing" series.

name: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena
description: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena is a 1v1 real-time PvP strategy simulation game with a controllable Champion aspect.

name: Stellata Waterway
description: An endless runner heavily inspired by the hoverboard levels from Klonoa 2 and retro PlayStation graphics.

name: Medieval Fantasy Survival Simulator 2: Gladiator Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Calliope Mori's Underworld Tour 2022
description: Calliope Mori takes her first break in millennia and goes golfing with her good friend Kureiji Ollie!

name: Luci RPG
description: Luci RPG is an adventure game in which LuciDin must journey to find some more, encountering strange characters, funny memes and gags, and a suspicious lil' cat who watches his every move!

name: Football Manager 2023 Touch
description: Play the beautiful game your way in Football Manager 2023 Touch as you experience the thrill of football management.

name: The King of Fighters Arena
description:
Enjoy the action of KOF anywhere, anytime!
Enter KOF Arena and become the strongest fighter in the world in the newest installment of the greatest fighting game series, The King of Fighters!

name: Blockchain Brawlers
description: Welcome to the Brawlerverse. Blockchain Brawlers is a PvP Web3 fighting game designed by Magic: The Gathering mastermind Richard Garfield and developed by Tyranno Studios. In this battle of strategy and suplexes, legions of glory-eyed grapplers go at it to prove who is Brawl mighty

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Street Art Paint Jobs Pack
description:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Street Art Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models (except 8x4 chassis configurations) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and to some of the ownable trailers as well!

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and are, of course, coming with predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck and trailer in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

Truck Yeah!
Colour Leap
Lost for Words
Red Dragon
Wild
Play Worlds

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

name: Frogo 3
description: This time Frogo wandered into the desert. He needs your help. To save Frogo you will have to avoid dangerous cars, collect enough bananas and help find his home. Good Luck!

name: Dead Cells: Everyone is Here Vol. 2
description: Introducing 6 new famous character (Shovel Knight, Hotline Miami, Katana Zero, Risk of Rain 2, Terraria & Slay the Spire) in this new cross over update. 6 new Outfits and Weapons based on 6 indie games crossovers!

name: Ruins
description: Run, jump, and teleport your way through a mysterious landscape where nothing is as it seems. Meet all the creatures of the land and learn their story. Help change the world and its future. You play as Timo, a curious boy, who wakes from a strange dream with some bizarre instructions.

name: MotoX
description: MotoX is an immersive motocross/motorcycle racing game where players can experience the speed, danger, and adrenaline of a virtual Motocross experience. Ride through 7 unique worlds that you can explore on your own in time trails.

name: Gabenwood: 99 Hidden Bucks
description: This is a hidden objects puzzle game what will test your wit and attentivnes. Save the Universe from destruction! Go to the Gabenwoods and find 99 bucks transferred there by some evil guy from our world.

name: Couroland
description: Idle RPG game

name: Void
description: There is nothing in void. Discorver new things in this empty place, and give them your own meaning. In this quiet space where converge to zero, Can you find a miracle?

name: Cat Herders: Couch Coop Cat Corralling!
description: Cat Herders is a 1-4 player, split-screen coop game. It's about herding cats. Each level has a goal, and your job is to get the cats into that goal as quickly as possible using a variety of fun items! Play with your friends, compete for the best times, and scream at them for their terrible strats!

name: Kill or Dead
description: A third-person war game that supports online play

name: Island Defender Jets
description: Island Defender Jets is a simple and easy-to-pick-up combat flight simulator where you have to destroy enemy ships, tanks and cruise missiles to protect your island, particularly the airports on it. Fuel, missiles and planes are limited, so use them wisely.

name: Dwarf Star
description: Dwarf Star: 16 bit inspired game where mercenary go shoot shoot on evil alien guys who were accidentally fabricated by the government. Top down space shooter with a mission based structure. However, you can do these missions in plenty of different orders with different amounts of upgrades.

name: Spells and Fellas
description: Spells and Fellas is an action-packed survival game with magic-based combat. Bring your enemies to their knees and receive more powerful spells and equipment as loot. Recruit allies to fight alongside you to increase your chances of surviving all 100 waves of enemies.

name: Bargain Platfomer
description: You will have to run, jump and dodge traps in this old-school platformer game. The ideal game to play in your lunch break.

name: Ringlorn Saga
description: Ringlorn Saga is an adventure RPG inspired by the Japanese PC classics. Prince Gerhard the Brave embarks on a journey to the neighboring land to investigate the appearance of a magic barrier and his father's disappearance.

name: Stunts Contest Extreme Cars
description: In this simulation-racing game, as an experienced driver, you will be able to modify your car in such a way that you really feel that you are driving cars from another planet...

name: Nature Escapes
description: Get ready to get lost in the wild beauty of Nature with this hidden object game! Let Nature Escapes take you on a trip to handcrafted snapshots of untamed wonder, and decorate your very own garden until it becomes a bouquet of beautiful plants and flowers!

name: Ghost Puncher
description: This is a beat'em up with influences from Guardian Heroes and Little Fighters 2, 3D hand-drawn environments, with anime-style characters and music composed exclusively for the game.

name: Soulstone Survivors
description: Face the Lords of the Void and their endless minions, collect their Soulstones and become a god! In this Action Roguelite, unveil secret spells, craft mighty weapons, unlock multiple characters, discover game-breaking synergies and conquer the power of the void.

name: Putrid Shot Ultra
description: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.

name: Astro Colony
description: Explore endless Universe and create the most efficient constellation of colonies. Build conveyor systems to automate production. Take care of Astronauts and their needs! Establish new colonies as part of intergalactic simulation.

name: Sonic Frontiers
description:
Worlds will collide in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest adventure.

An experience like never before, accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high velocity open-zone freedom. Battle powerful enemies as you speed through the Starfall Islands - landscapes brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, sizzling deserts and more!

name: Night Signal
description: Congratulations on your state-of-the-art Hinnikers Television set! You are ready to enter the wonderful world of televised programming! One word of warning however - Hinnikers brand televisions do not function properly after midnight.

name: Villages
description: Villages is an Open-World Sandbox game that have rules to encourage players to make complex society and economy.

name: Wormwood IV: The Final Chapter
description: A 10-level Halloween-themed wad for Doom II, Wormwood IV features maps by Ribbiks, Grain of Salt, and dannebubinga.

name: Night on Doom Mountain
description: A lengthy and difficult single level for Boom Compatible ports with a slightly otherworldly and halloween-esque theme.

name: Nutty Noon
description: Nutty Noon is a Celeste mod which draws heavy inspiration from Kirby's Return to Dream Land, specifically level 5: Nutty Noon. It takes on the themes from this area, as well as the difficulty of the Kirby game (beginner). It focuses more on exploration and multiple routes, but also features a full B and C-side which are more linear and low intermediate difficulty.

name: Stattogories
description: IMDb, Google, Spotify, Wikipedia or YouTube. All these higher or lower games are as fun as each other!

name: Evidence 111
description:
Close your eyes and play this thrilling detective audio game.
Are you a fan of detective stories? Do you like mysteries? Are you listening to audio books and podcast every day? Then this detective audio game is right for you!
September 13, 1985, a small town of Farnham, England. Just like every Friday, Chief inspector Alice Wells is on duty. An ordinary night shift is suddenly interrupted by a mysterious phone call - an anonymous caller knows something about the chief inspector that none was supposed to find out.
What will you do in this situation? What choices will you take? What mystery is hidden inside long-forgotten file containing Evidence 111? How the story of chief inspector Alice Wells ends is up to you.

name: Verwandlung
description:
A short horror game loosely inspired by Kafka's "The Metamorphosis"
Made as part of the Haunted PS1 Halloween Jam 2022

name: Welcome to Scott's Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
description: Sin descripción

name: Donkey Kong 4
description:
Imagine if instead of Super Mario Bros., they had created a 4th Donkey Kong game with the same gameplay…

This game contains a redesigned World 1 and assets from the classic Donkey Kong games, Mario Bros., and Wrecking Crew. Mario must climb the ladder at the end of each level to make it to 1-4 where he must rescue Pauline.

name: Alice fell to Neverland
description:
Caroline and Lewis are two 14 year-old students at St. Mary's Boarding School, who have fallen into a deep hole in the middle of the forest. With no way to climb out, the only clue they have to return is a strange white rabbit.

Finish puzzles, find your way home and learn the truth behind the dark place you've stumbled upon.

Are you the one destined to fulfill the role of Alice?

name: A Role to Play
description:
In A Role to Play, an armored fellow of varying potential names must escort a princess through a besieged kingdom to safety, accompanied by several colorful, non-human companions.

Of course, that's only half the story.

Our real protagonist, Danny, has spent the past year recovering from a life-threatening incident that left him severely injured. Nearing his 21st birthday, and with some pressuring from his father, he leaves the solitude of his home to meet up with a local group of tabletop gamers at his town's library. A newcomer to tabletop, Danny finds that his new friends are about as unusual as the characters they play in-game.

name: Callthem
description: Police agent Jane, goes to a notice on route 45, where a motel is located, after that call, no one showed signs of life there, Jane will explore the motel in search of clues.

name: Mainbody
description: A puzzle-based horror game where the player takes on the role of a building manager who manages a haunted building and its "patients". Through the player's different options will raise or lower the pollution value, thus triggering different endings.

name: IronKnight
description: The sky roared and the flames of the city continued to burn. The enemy has broken through the line of defense of mankind, and warships from outer space are invading the last home of mankind. Rise up, iron knight, drive your iron car and fight for your protection city.

name: Mr. White
description: You're trapped inside Mr. White's huge dark creepy house. You have to find a way to escape without getting caught.

name: Hentai CatMaid
description: Hentai CatMaid is a relaxing puzzle game. Enjoy the sexy girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Assassins Guild
description: In this action-adventure game you will take a role of the former assassins who decided to change his life and leave the assassins' guild to become an ordinary peaceful man. Will his dreams come true?

name: The Jumping Bagel: Turbo
description: Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The In Between
description: A competitive party game that pits demons against spell-casting hunters! A demon must possess a hunter to attack other hunters, and a hunter must successfully attack a possessed hunter to defeat the demon. But both sides must be careful to not attack members of their own team.

name: Psycho Reign
description: Psycho Reign is a Single or 2 player co-operative online horror puzzle and stealth game where in each level you will be chased by a blood thirsty psycho. Look for and solve mini puzzles in order to progress further on the map. Ultimately, find something to fight back...or get chopped up.

name: Erebe
description: Join Erebe's pit as a Mythical Heroe with unique abilities! Defeat your ennemies in simultaneous cards duels where anticipation and forecast are the keys of your victory! Will you be the best mastermind ?

name: Davey
description: DAVEY is a fun, addictive platform puzzle game in anime styled 3D with realistic jumps and movements using motion capture and voice acting. Help Davey escape the facility after being kept prisoner for his unique invisibilty ability.

name: ET Superman: Wrath of Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: Peter, who has been collecting dinosaur eggs, went to the abandoned Tyrannosaurus Rex park. Unfortunately, he was trapped by the mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. The ferocious mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex chases Ethan Pitt. Ethan Pitt needs to use all his wisdom and ability to escape.

name: Love In the Valley
description:
A mysterious new farmer is in town. They're silent, rich, and super hot. The spring flower dance is only a week away! Can you win their affections and score a date with them to the dance?

Stardew Valley meets Monster Prom in this visual novel! You can play as Sebastian or Abigail and visit Cindersap Forest and Town Square.

name: Alice Clancy's Shattered Dimensions
description: A nine map wad Made from scratch inspired by Megawads such as Eviternity, Ancient Aliens and Taransman's Projectile Hell. It follows Alice Clancy, a rookie marine who guards a new portal created by the UAC that allows them to go to other dimensions, but an accident happens and she gets transported to that dimensions where demons struck a deal with a cult of foul creatures known as the Serpanteens, after the first encounters with them She finds out that they made a deal with them to conduct a secret experiment, that acquires creating a new powerful monster, Alice needs to figure out the secrets of the Research and try to stop this powerful monster before he enters and destroy her Home Dimension.

name: Deadliest Demolition
description: A 11-map Vanilla Dehacked mapset loosely inspired by the 1995 Cabal series, originally created for NaNoWADMo 2022. This mod contains numerous gameplay changes to your weapons. After a humiliating defeat, your supervisor saw it fit to demote you from a cyberdemon to a mere human, so that you can learn to maximize your combat potential instead of squandering your superior firepower. But there's no force in hell that could ever make you part with your beloved weapon...

name: Divergence
description: Sin descripción

name: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition
description: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition is an update for D-Virus: Evil Menance that completely improves the game and adds new content.

name: Precious Theatre: Pilot
description: The first installment of Precious Theatre ~an experimental magical girl yuri slice of life visual novel

name: Something Nefarious Below
description: This is a FNAF styled game where you need to clean a ritual that took place, all while you feel someone is there with you. Do your job, pick everything up, and leave.

name: Mobius Theory
description: Sin descripción

name: !Pattern
description:
You are on a 2x2 square, you have to avoid empty tiles coming, but beware of tricky pattern and be thoughtful of your moves.

!Pattern is a game where you have to see in the future what is coming.
It's chill, but intense at the same time.

4 worlds with unique gameplay to complete.
An infinite mode to show off that you are the greatest human being.
A free and complete game without ads.

name: Metal Gear Solid 2: The Substance of Subsistence
description: "Metal Gear Solid 2: The Substance of Subsistence" is mod for "Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance" that adds the third person camera view and game controls from "Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence".

name: Futanari Sex: Locker Room Affair
description: An erotic visual novel about two gorgeous cheerleaders after a day of practice. Everything takes a turn when the secretly futanari starts taking pictures of her naked teammate.

name: The Contract Bound
description: The Contract Bound is a linear, fully voiced kinetic-NVL that's a bit audio-book + a bit puppet show + a bit D&D-inspired tomfoolery!

name: ET Varginha
description: In this game, you play the role of the ET from Varginha who is running away from the army that wants to capture him. Help the ET from Varginha in many puzzle challenges found in every level of this adventure.

name: Awesome Platformers Bundle
description: Check out our games that have kept thousands of our players entertained!

name: CampNight
description: Take care of your fire or you freeze to death!

name: Omega Mouse
description: Omega Mouse is a tactical-action style game of cat and mouse. Know when to retreat and when to attack. Climb the leaderboard rankings by competing for the highest enemy kill counts.

name: Breadsticks
description: A speed-based platformer with throwable platforms! Travel through the dangers in the woods as a fox boy to join afternoon tea with Mr. Bear.

name: The Dog Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: E.E.R.I.E2
description: E.E.R.I.E 2 is a tactical shooting game. In the modern Gensokyo, play the role of fairy Luna, and uses a variety of modern light weapons and tactical equipment to join in a war that decides the fate of Gensokyo.

name: Amok Runner
description: One day, a noble woman turns our protagonist's (the doctor) life upside down by visiting his clinic, in a town where the amok madness is rampant. The doctor leaves all his personal effects and career aside and begins to follow this woman's footsteps while fighting against the deadly amok syndrome.

name: Space Shrooms RollPlay
description: Anime style story and dice games with music. single player, PVP, local, LAN and online.

name: Prime Horror II
description: A comedic 4v1 8 page horror game.

name: Zombie Survivors
description: Battle zombies, earn experience, collect loot and level up in this dopamine fueled auto shooter filled with roguelike action.

name: Maestro VR
description: Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Feel the unique experience of conducting a symphony orchestra.

name: Lilith Odyssey
description: The Great Nacho Wars have ended. A corrupt galactic government saps life and resources from the many war-weary planets it controls. Your alien family risks everything across an open-world galactic odyssey to find a mysterious land of new beginnings. And they’re all aware of their simulated nature.

name: Running Fable
description: Running Fable is an online multiplayer racing-strategy game for up to 10 players, in which each player must place items and traps strategically before battling against each other on vibrant fantastical levels.

name: Remute: Generations
description: After releasing albums for the Nintendo 64 and Gameboy Advance, Remute's third (!) album in 2022 comes for Sega Dreamcast and ends the year with maximum 128-bit power! Generations features 15 brand new songs and stunning visuals by Duranik - developer of the shoot 'em up game 'Sturmwind'.

name: The 2nd Old-School Level Design Contest: Collaboration Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: Downward
description: What's at the bottom of the pit? Could be anything! Could be everything! I have to find out!

name: High School Daze: Afterschool Stories
description: There's no room for lazy weekend plans when your best friend's family requests your help with their garage sale. But it's not a completely bad time!

name: Under the Brine
description:
There’s something off in this town, and the forest is one of them.
Your whole life flips upside down the day you stumble across a dead body at the beach that nobody seems to recognize.
It’s up to you to find out what really happened and save him before it's too late.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: USA Route - Forest Industry
description: A fictional route representing a US shortline or branchline, located among Pine forests, with a small logging industry. The map is highly detailed, with TurfFX grass and PBR textures. Includes 2 freight train sessions.

name: Saint Patricks Day Fun
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Bad
description: Throw papers and smash stuff!

name: Car Parking Club
description: Visit a luxury club, where owners of the most exclusive, slickest and fastest cars come to unwind!

name: Survival in the Backrooms
description: Survival in the Backrooms is an atmospheric horror game in which you will wander for a long time through surreal corridors and rooms in search of a way out. Immerse yourself in this mysterious world and try not to become prey for its inhabitants.

name: Book Travelers: A Victorian Story - Collector's Edition
description: As head librarian takes a strange turn when novelist Charlotte Brontë herself magically appears to ask for your help! Someone’s going into famous stories and changing them, threatening the worlds and characters inside. Can you travel into your favorite novels to stop a dangerous vigilante in time?

name: Atlanta 1864
description: Refight the battle for Atlanta during the American Civil War in 1864.

name: Puzzline
description: This is a 2-4 player board game connecting cards like a puzzle! Each card has a special effect. Play them strategically and get the victory! Online play is also supported!

name: Uproot
description: Uproot is an indie point-and-click adventure and puzzle game. Help Ygg the mandrake reclaim his special purple leaf stolen by the Rat King.

name: Furry Meow
description: Furry Meow - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful kitties.

name: HerrAnwalt: Lawyers Legacy
description: You’re a Lawyer who tries to save students from a crazy headmaster. You need to survive a variety of school lessons and fight the different teachers

name: Asian Cargo Sim
description: You only need a few seconds to enter this atmosphere.

name: Mission Commando
description: As a member of the famous marines commando, you are sent on a perilous mission in an hostile territory. Defeat the ennemies and their powerfull weapons and fight bosses til victory.

name: Mission: Aliens
description: Sergeant, last night we received a signal that an unknown aircraft of extraterrestrial origin had crashed in the taiga. The locals assured us that at the crash site they observed five creatures very similar to humans, only with gray skin and large almond-shaped eyes.

name: Minesweeper Arcade
description: Take on a 50-level minesweeper arcade challenge, or relive the nostalgic fun of classic minesweeper.

name: Non-Euclidean
description: Nothing ever truly resorts to such madness, but when something is brought to exist that fragments the true nature of what we believe to be possible, everything goes out the window and into the mits of madness.

name: Agelast
description: Agelast is a horror game set in Korea, played from the perspective of a student in a difficult situation. Find a way out and interact as you progress through the story. There are no puzzles.

name: Battle Gear
description: A zombie virus that began with a meteorite, the surviving humans fled to the sea by boat. To get the world back, And for the victory of the human race, Solve the problems, As a troubleshooter for the UN, that's your mission.

name: Arcade vs Player
description: For a long time the arcade machines were won and forgotten in the corners of bars, but the time for the arcade machines revenge has arrived. Prepare your coins.

name: Ambushed
description: Ambushed is a 4-player online co-operative horror game. You are trapped in a forest haunted by the ghosts of those who have died here. It's dark. It's cold. But you have nowhere else to go. If you want to live you'll need to finish the ritual and cleanse the forest of the spirits residing there.

name: Save the Queen
description: The Skull King has risen once more. As the last bastion against evil, it is your duty to stop him and restore the country to it's peaceful form.

name: Monster Cube
description: You are a Cronenberg monster meat cube that devours incoming projectiles. Designed to be a simple experience while you talk with your friends in the background or simply want to reach a new high score.

name: Bitter Belief
description: Bitter Belief is an metroidvania game that with a very engaging story provides adventure and drama. Face monsters and different challenges as you travel through unknown lands in search of the magic eyes of stone to bring your exorcist father back to life, after having a contact with his spirit.

name: Five Nights At Furry's
description: You, in the role of an FBI agent, must investigate the mysterious murders in the amusement park for the fury fans. For five days, watch the cameras looking for clues and unravel this case before it's too late.

name: No Men in This House
description: "No men in this house" is a visual novel set in Thailand. This edge-of-your-seat detective story about mysterious deaths on a touristy island will make you suspect everyone, including yourself!

name: Dan's Odyssey
description: An arcade arena top down shooter. fast paced action with a great sound-track. shoot your way through the approaching enemy shapes, upgrade your character and beat the high score.

name: Lost Dream: Stars
description: It was a day like any other, until the stars turned brighter than ever. Hop on a quest to discover the meaning of the suddenly bright stars.

name: Walk While My Grandmother Plays the Piano
description: This is a simple game. All you do is walk, and my grandmother will play the piano. There's nothing else to it.

name: Salvando la Isla Perdida
description: Lost Island game sheet Captain Karpin doesn't want there to be children on Isla Perdida.

name: Keep Me Posted
description: Deliver mail and get comfy in this warm, yet eldritch action-adventure game. Stamp out your foes, help out a friend, and save the forest before it's too late!

name: 7 Days of Rose
description: Michael considers himself to be a boring, average 17-year old. While most of his classmates have discovered their passions and talents, nothing seems to draw his interest. It's finally summer and he's trying to decide what to do with his life after schoo…

name: The Legend of Tiger and Phoenix
description: The Legend of Tiger And Phoenix is a unique timing-parrying/infiltrating game that allows you to experience Fireballs, Energy Blast, ​levitating, and the life of an invisible human.

name: Digit Factory
description: 《Digit Factory》 is a game that allows you to give full play to your creativity and enjoy the fun of thinking. Design your own pipeline to perform calculations on various combinations of numbers. In the endless demand, find a design that responds to changes with the same. Come , challenge your mind!

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 9
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: I Wanna Go Home
description: Can't stand working overtime anymore! Must find some properties to get rid of this ugly office,be aware of the mean boss,don't get caught by him!

name: Eyo: Jump 'n' Run RPG
description: Upgrade your robot, equip powerful weapons and defences and uncover the secret of your existence. Merciless enemies, treacherous traps and tricky jump 'n' run passages await you in this Jump 'n' Run RPG adventure by two passionate indie game developers.

name: Juno 06
description: Complete fast turn-based battles in any order you like as you rise to the top in a psychic battle arena on the moon... Discover a twisted plot during your downtime.

name: Drunk: Relapsed
description: Drunk: Relapsed is a challenging and comedic 3D adventure. You will need to stumble and hop through the treacherous streets and alleys to reach the safety of your house. On your journey you'll be able to collect drinks to unlock new outfits.

name: The C64 Collection 1
description:
THEC64 Collection 1 cartridge for Evercade brings the golden age of '80s home computer games back for another round. Take on the world in thrilling sport action with Summer Games and Winter Games, indulge in some perilous platforming in Jumpman and take on the role of a martial arts master in Lee. Then "stay a while, stay forever" with Impossible Mission and a great selection of other big hits and deep cuts from THEC64's extensive back catalogue!

Cartridge contains the following 14 games:
- Summer Games
- Winter Games
- Impossible Mission
- Jumpman
- Lee
- Gateway to Apshai
- The Movie Monster Game
- Marauder
- Stormlord
- Subterranea
- Iridis Alpha
- Battle Valley
- Alleykat
- Street Sports Baseball

name: Alwa's Awakening & Cathedral
description:
In the Alwa's Awakening and Cathedral cartridge for Evercade, you've got two huge exploration-heavy platform adventures ahead of you. Save the land of Alwa as the video game-loving Zoe in Alwa's Awakening, and discover the truth behind an unnamed knight's identity in the mysterious Cathedral.

Cartridge containing the following 2 games:
- Alwa's Awakening: The 8-bit Edition
- Cathedral

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion
description: Play as your favorite Bratz character and begin your globe-trotting adventure to become the world’s best fashion reporter.

name: Froggie: A Retro Platformer
description: Froggie is a platform game with retro graphics

name: Neon Nights 2
description: Continue with Kate's lewd story in the continuation of the original Neon Nights, now taking part at the police station after she got arrested! Will she find a way out of this mess? Or will she have to spend the night in a cold, lonely cell?

name: Archmage Ricka
description: In order to retrieve the illegal property embezzled by the evil Lord, Ricka received a mission to capture the Lord. But it was a trap. She fell into a dungeon arranged by the Lord in advance. Although the demons in the dungeon are weak, the existence of various traps makes it difficult to escape!

name: Repetendium
description: Fight against an army of elemental creatures hell bent on your destruction. Compete with other players on the leaderboards to show who is the master of Repetendium!

name: Harvestella
description: Introducing a brand-new fantasy x life simulation RPG from Square Enix! Through the changing seasons, explore an imaginative world, tend your crops, make new friends, face enemies in dynamic combat, and unravel the mystery of the season of death, Quietus.

name: American Truck Simulator 2022
description: American Truck Driving Simulator 2022 with Cargo Truck Game Get ready for new, offline, and free truck driving simulator in cargo truck game creator of gaming engine.

name: Polgar: Magic Detective
description: Discover the mysteries of Polgar and solve magic crimes! Investigate the evidences in each case and hunt down the right creature - don't let the culprit go unpunished!

name: Candle Prick
description: Puzzle game about using your enemies as extensions of yourself

name: Tint n Ink
description:
Tint n Ink is a first person shooter videogame about Paintball, fight & hit your rivals and get fun everytime.

Find strategies, use the best techniques and create amazing tactics to destroy your opponents.

name: Goddess of Victory: Nikke
description: Goddess of Victory: Nikke is an immersive sci-fi RPG shooter game, where you recruit and command various maidens to form a beautiful anime girl squad that specializes in wielding guns and other unique sci-fi weapons. Command and collect girls that have unique combat specialties to create your ultimate team! Experience next-level shooting action with simple yet intuitive controls while enjoying dynamic battle effects.

name: AAA Clock 2
description:
In a world where most clocks are either boring or colorless, AAA Clock 2 is going to change everything.

This autumn AAA Clock will prove once again that sequels can be just as extraordinary as the originals. Customize your clock and set up alarms in this engaging clock experience.

There is more! Sink into the built in platformer game Jelly&Vulca. A continuation of the game first introduced in the original AAA Clock. Customize your character and set out on an epic adventure.

name: Niteline
description: Sin descripción

name: OneBit Jetpack
description: A little high score game for the Playdate inspired by the 80s classic Jetpac.

name: Space Papers: Planet's Border
description: Attention, Earthwad! Welcome to Nations United by Convenience, the NUC. You have just called up for a great mission on Earth as an intergalactic border patrol officer!

name: Plutonian Sunrise
description: Plutonian Sunrise is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Dear, Ella
description:
Get ready to immerse yourself in Dear, Ella - an anime-style collectible RPG!

Heros can be converted into NFTs (a process not described on the website).
Crystal and Gem in-game currencies can be converted into tokens at XPLA GAMES in the XPLA Blockchain Ecosystem.

name: WRC Generations: Citroën C4 WRC 2010
description: The most successful car in WRC history. With 3 manufacturers' titles and 4 drivers' titles within a four-year period, it experienced little else except success, thanks to the legendary driver Sébastien Loeb.

name: WRC Generations: Peugeot 206 WRC 2002
description:
24 wins, 3 manufacturers' titles, 2 drivers' titles… the Peugeot 206 left a big mark in its era and was driven by top drivers such as Marcus Grönholm and Gilles Panizzi.
With WRC Generations, you can get behind the wheel of this iconic car and experience the extreme sensations it was famous for.

name: Sylvie Lime
description:
Sylvie Lime is an absurdist girls' love exploration platformer.
Turn into a lime and collect different items in a lovely open world.
️ Meet various girls in the computer and try to help them.

name: Mecha Ritz: Steel Rondo 2.0
description: An expanded version of Doujin shooting game Mecha Ritz, featuring new ships, adjusted game balance, new story content and various other adjustments.

name: Kaiser
description: Go on a campaign to dethrone the kaiser! Build an army, strengthen yourself with powerful artefacts and defeat the forces he sends to stop you. Kaiser is a casual roguelike game where you fight thousands of enemies in an attempt to become the new kaiser.

name: Angry Birds Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: The Button Be Daylight
description: Sin descripción

name: WRC Generations: Fully Loaded Edition
description: Get the most complete WRC Generations experience with the Fully Loaded Edition!

name: Hitme 2
description:
A new chapter in the story of HITME.

In the first chapter, Astra & Dei taught me to love. Now, a new boy has fallen onto an orange tree. His sadness reminds me of mine. Will I know how to teach others what I learned from Astra & Dei?

name: Arcade Paradise: Empathy DLC
description: Time to grasp the handles and ascend the mountain whilst avoiding being hit by rocks from unbelievers. The longer you survive the more points you score. Forsake loneliness. Feel togetherness. Ascend. How high can you go?

name: Shin Galaxy: Alpha War
description: A space shooter game with RPG mechanics. Players will be able to improve their ships to tackle the challenges ahead, as well as buy better ships and customize them.

name: Sector Sweep
description: Choose your character from many Sector Sweepers and clean the next planets from ever-growing enemies in this top-down action roguelike shooter. Unlock new sectors by defeating enemies and upgrading your weapons or hero powers. Be the best Sector Sweeper the company ever had!

name: Blocks Tracks Trains
description: A relaxing sandbox train set diorama. Build your world, create buildings, set up your track network, and watch your trains go.

name: Poly Memory: Dinosaurs
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with dinosaurs.

name: Ghost Village
description: My grandmother was originally from the village, but after the environmental disaster that occurred 30 years ago near their settlement, she moved to our city and lived with us.

name: Volleyball Trainer: The Legend of Sports
description: Become the best volleyball coach and lead your team to success! Play this adventure where card games are combined with the mythical Arcade mini-games. You will have to be agile and think fast if you want to win all the tournaments and take the victory.

name: Catacomb Kitties
description: In a nutshell: - A micro RPG with about 2-4 hours of play for each run - Randomized worlds, dungeons, and cities - A cool personality profile at the end of each game based on your actions during play - 6 Kitty classes to choose from!

name: Ultra Age: Rebirth Project
description: Age was exploring a portal in the Frontier Shelter when he was suddenly moved to what appears to be a laboratory by an unknown force. It seems to be a laboratory of the Frontier meant for testing creatures, filled with many devices to measure and record combat capabilities and strengthen their shortcomings. All experimental subjects created from these repeated experiments are beings who seek perfection, created solely from data.

name: Snow Madness
description:
This game provides an easy-to-play and fluent experience to player/players through both "Single-Player" and "Local 2-Player" mods.
In order to succeed in levels, you will need to get rid of unique enemies with your snowballs.
Snow Madness brings fun and competitiveness together and makes you experience an old-school atari game sensation.
Select the appropriate difficulty level and start to have fun!

name: Finding America: The Heartland - Collector's Edition
description: Strap on your seatbelts for a trip to America's Heartland!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Biohazard Pack
description:
The Rockpox has come to Hoxxes, and our doughty Miners must face it properly equipped! Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. With the Biohazard Pack, you will be dressed to impress in the finest hazmat suits R&D have ever produced, shielding you from even the nastiest of airborne contaminants.

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class
- A unique helmet in two variants (Full Face & Half Face)
- Biohazard Paintjob for other Armors
- Biohazard Paintjob for your Weapons
- Biohazard Paintjob for Bosco
- Biohazard Paintjob for your Pickaxe
Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 3 - Plaguefall
description: The Rivals have been pushed back for the moment, but only just in time for a brand new threat to rear its ugly head. An insidious lithophage, a sickness of the very rock beneath our feet, has struck Hoxxes. Nicknamed the 'Rockpox', this planetary pathogen is spreading through the caves, infecting the rock and even directly affecting the local fauna. Even the hardy Dwarves can feel its insidious grasp. Prepare for PLAGUEFALL!

name: Dead Age: Zombie Adventure & Shooting Game
description: Defend your city against waves of zombies in this totally new arcade survival shooting game with totally unique cartoon style!

name: Golazo! 2: Soccer Cup 2022
description:
Golazo 2 boldly recalls the glory days of the arcade soccer games, bringing back memories of cult classics we all know. Street mechanics and fields are added to this sequel to bring more depth to this game. Certainly a perfect game for people who are wary of football managers or complicated hard-core simulators. You just grab your pad, sit on the couch and play!

Features:
- 58 national teams
- 10 international stadiums
- 12 street teams
- 6 street fields
- Street world tour
- International Cup
- World League
- European Cup

name: Golazo! 2: Qatar International Stars
description: You'll be able to participate in the challenging Qatar Cup 2022. Choose one of the 32 participating, win the group stages and playoffs and become World Champion!

name: Wash Card
description: A turn-base strategy card game : with Chinese ink painting as the artistic style, the game between ancient strategist and Taoists as the story background, and combining philosophy and strategy, experience the harmony and unity of man and nature.

name: Classical Music Minesweeper
description: A new and innovative minesweeper that allows you to casually enjoy feeling like you have better ears. The number of mines in a traditional minesweeper is represented by a number. In this game, the number of mines is represented by the sound of a piano.

name: Boot Camp Endless Runner
description: Free to play, Endless Runner. Dodge Obstacles and collect Ammo

name: Angelic Wishes
description: Angelic Wishes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Degen Royale
description: We welcome you to Degen Royale, a First-Person-Shooter taking place on the tropical Degen Islands. We bring the fun back into the gaming experience. Join us in whacky online rumbles with your friends and see if you can become the Degen Royale champion.

name: Darkness Reborn
description: Short and very dark Medival-Fantasy themed Single-Player RPG

name: Hentai Neko
description: Hentai neko is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Black Emperor
description: "Black Emperor" is a gorgeous action, independent fighting game with Chinese characteristics and culture! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience unlimited fun and pleasure from it! It's definitely worth it! Otherwise you will regret for life!

name: Pip 6
description: Pip 6 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Pengreens
description: Deliver different equipment onto trucks, Manipulate a path to move on, Navigate between platform puzzles and rebuild Penguinland. Carry Ice Blocks along the levels, avoiding to break Carbon Boxes, while planning ahead to beat thight time requeriments, in this level based puzzle platformer.

name: The Expedition Squad
description: Be part of the second expedition team sent to shed light on the mysteries of the archipelago. Make your way through hordes of zombies, hostile factions and hostile creatures in a game environment where recklessness and poor planning could put you in serious trouble.

name: Camping
description: Embark on a camping trip with your best friends in this retro styled game, just be careful, not everything is what it seems behind the cute look.

name: QUByte Classics: The Samurai Collection
description: Experience the ultimate in martial arts mayhem in The Samurai Collection!

name: The Jumping Bagel
description: Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Off to Sleep
description:
An adventure highly focused on the story.
2D strategic RPG with turn-based battles.
The combat system allows you to configure your robot ally's AI.
Topics covered: ethics, determinism, relativism, definition of "life" and "conscience".

name: Run Box Run
description: Online Platforming Fun for Everyone!

name: World of Motors 2
description: world of motors 2. A game tailored to your requirements. Multiplayer, Car modification, Compete with anyone else, Racing and Drifting with friends, Real world and real cars, Multiple maps, and Real multi cars.

name: Cat Herder
description: Cat Herder is a cute and chaotic little puzzle game about literally herding cats! Pick them up, entice them with toys, and learn their preferences as you wrangle them into the target zones as quickly as possible.

name: Necro Saga
description: The story of you and the immortals begins in a kingdom about to be destroyed by a necromancer. You can give someone mercy, or you can take someone's precious things away. This is an action RPG where you decide the ending of the story.

name: Delivery Driver: The Simulation
description: You are a delivery driver, your primary job duties include ensuring successful transfer and delivery of goods to intended destinations.

name: RichBroker
description: RichBroker is a keyboard controlled tycoon game. Build & sell buildings, upgrade your company and buy out your competitors!

name: Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home
description: Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

name: Talon City: Death from Above
description: You’re a clever owl lawyer out of your depth, searching for a missing client. With enemies at every turn, can you survive and save the day?

name: Pirated Code: Admin Edition
description: When an AI program named Seren awakens to find they've been installed as the co-pilot of a smuggling ship, they'll have to rely on their newfound crewmates to help them find where they belong.

name: Blood Flowers
description: is an AVG single-player game with storyline and puzzle solving as its core gameplay. Yinchen Zhang, a meteorite hunter, beginning with a meteorite that contains the qualities of revitalisation, the story gradually unravels the mystery of memories from 20 years ago.

name: Seasons of the Sorcerer
description: Seasons of the Sorcerer is a top-down action game set to Antonio Vivaldi's "Four Seasons.” Use a diverse set of spells to incinerate, bash, transform, and control your foes on a year long journey across early Renaissance Italy.

name: Malice
description: You fall through a sinkhole and discovers a nightmarish Japanese sunken mansion, with a sinister presence lingering and terrifying threats. The only way to out is in. Malice is a 2 player compulsory co-op survival horror, where you make unforgiving choices and rely on your wits to survive.

name: Desperate: Vladivostok
description: Desperate: Vladivostok is a Bullet Hell VR action filled game with furious fights and adrenaline shootouts accompanied by dynamic music. Dive into the criminal history of a hired killer in the post-Soviet cyberpunk era and fight with him 'til the bitter end.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch
description: Set off on a captivating horseback adventure and discover the mysteries of Emerald Valley!

name: The Chant: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Entropy Centre
description: Think in reverse. Outsmart the impossible. A mind-bending first-person adventure where you solve ingenious and complex puzzles by rewinding objects through time.

name: Liminal Phase
description: Liminal Phase is a VR action horror game set in a parallel ‘90s. Fight malevolent monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore the dark corners of a fractured mind consumed by video games.

name: WRC Generations
description:
New mechanics have been integrated to represent the demands of the hybrid engines. In order to win, you have to carefully manage your battery by adapting your engine mapping throughout the special stages you take part in.

As community satisfaction is always a priority , you can now share customised livery and stickers with other players. The best creations will be rewarded and highlighted.

name: Eschaton
description: Eschaton is a short, surreal first-person exploration game. Explore the 'aftermath' of a cult ritual in the grounds of a manor in the remote and picturesque Scottish highlands.

name: Kartoffl
description: Kartoffl is a ridiculously cute but challenging VR puzzle game with Lemmings-like vibes.

name: Puppeteers
description: PUPPETEERS is a first person, action packed co-op horror game. Experience a terrifying campaign by yourself, or partner up with up to 4 players in a cooperative horror adventure. Run. Hide. But try not to scream, it might hear you.

name: Outshine
description: Unleash your powers against your oppressors in this arcade, fast-paced typing game. Avoid traps, destroy enemies, defeat bosses to seek your revenge, and rush to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Skycliffs
description: Skycliffs is an action shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with fast-paced top-down platforming. Jump and dash across sky islands, fight loads of monsters, and get upgrades to survive the many dangers of your journey. Will you be strong enough to reach and defeat the keeper of this floating world?

name: Valor
description: Embark on a epic journey through a range of different environments and arenas. Upgrade, personalize and finetune your characters, overcome different challenges and bossfights to prove the single most important thing: your worth as a gladiator.

name: Mei Qi: Season 6
description: The sixth season of "Mei qi" series contains a total of 6 DLCs, which will be updated one after another. The update cycle is one DLC every 2 weeks.

name: DarKnot
description: DarKnot is a game about the extermination of monsters on the streets of a foggy city. Here you will find insidious opponents, dynamic battles and puzzles of various degrees of difficulty. It's up to you to decide in what style to play the game.

name: Laika
description: Laika is a third person perma-death runner game. A robot named Rico launched into the space. While Rico overcome various obstacles, his journey starts by encountering Laika's trace and ends by finding Laika!

name: From Space
description: From Space is a solo and co-op action-shooter for squads up to four players. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from an alien infestation with your friends, using over-the-top weaponry in a post-apocalyptic world with awesomely stylized graphics. The apocalypse has never been so much fun!

name: The Chant
description: The Chant is an action horror game set on the tormented grounds of a new age cult, that fulfills players' thrill of supernatural horrors dealing with the dark sides of spirituality and cultism, and untangles terrifying revelations about the universe.

name: A Walk With Yiayia
description: A Walk with Yiayia is a light adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall. Connect through engaging conversations, explore a relaxing environment, and complete microquests in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure.

name: How to Say Goodbye
description:
How to say Goodbye tells the story of a character recently turned into a ghost, lost in an unknown world populated by spirits.
In this narrative puzzle game, move the elements of decor and the characters to guide them out of the liminal space between life and death in which they are trapped.
Help them find their friends who are prisoners of a mysterious wizard and accompany them on their journey to the other side.

name: RoboCo
description: RoboCo is a sandbox game about designing and building robots to serve the needs of squishy, hapless humans in the world of tomorrow.

name: Kingshunt
description: Kingshunt is a third-person tactical arena brawler set in a dark fantasy world. Form a team of five, choose your hero and take the fight to the enemy in this competitive online multiplayer game. Summon powerful minions and towers to combat the enemy team.

name: Honey, I Joined a Cult
description: It's time to start working towards that ultimate goal of enlightenment, faith and money…lots and lots of money. Create, customise, expand and manage your own cult whilst listening to funky music in Honey, I Joined a Cult!

name: Silver Nornir
description:
Journey through the world with friends and allies and unfold new adventures!
Featuring a wide cast of characters each with their own story to tell, an intense battle system that includes magic gems, special moves, and combo techniques with other characters, Silver Nornir boasts of everything an RPG has to offer! Collect useful items and unlock extra dungeons for additional enjoyment!

name: Ghost Song
description: On the desolate moon of Lorian V, a long-dormant Deadsuit awakens from slumber. Journey beneath the surface on an atmospheric 2D adventure of self-discovery, ancient mysteries, and cosmic terror. Explore winding caverns and acquire new abilities to unearth this alien world’s long-buried secrets.

name: Piece by Piece
description:
Piece by piece is a pretty simple game for kids and adults to help you kill time.

The aim of the game is quite simple - earn as many points as possible in a certain time by putting the pieces together.

name: Azure Be Gone
description: Medium sized runic / metal themed level in a classic style, a remix of the author's 2004 release "Azure Influx" (flecksp1).

name: Farm Merge Valley
description: Farm Merge Valley is a casual farming game where you merge various animals and objects to upgrade them. Grow crops and add animals to your farm while expanding to exciting new lands. Discover the peaceful farm life you always dreamed of while reaping the rewards from various challenges.

name: Wordkour
description: WORDKOUR - Are You a Parkour Enthusiast Who also likes Word Games? Then WORDKOUR is for You!

name: Cracking the Cryptic: GAS Volume #1
description: A pack of 60 Genuinely Approachable Sudokus (“GAS”) from the brilliant minds of Clover, Sam Cappleman-Lynes and Philip Newman.

name: Summer Heat
description:
Summer Heat is a romantic visual novel with heavy emphasis on choices. Some choices affect dialogue, while others impact the story in major ways. There are five main girls for you to romance, each with her own story branch, and even more side girls if you only want a casual fling.

The game has a smartphone. In future updates, we plan to fully flesh out the apps and make them really fun and exciting to use! The dating app Ember will be an especially big part of it, with Influencer-tier patrons being able to vote on decisions regarding Ember's content.

Other features we plan to include in the game are animation and an interactive photography system.

name: Waccha PriMagi! Studio
description: Waccha PriMagi! Studio is a Japanese rhythm-based amusement arcade game, it's the successor of the Waccha PriMagi! arcade game.

name: Genshin Impact: Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
description:
Version 3.2 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Nahida and Layla
• New main story quests: Chapter III, Act V - Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
• New story quests for Nahida
• New main event: Fabulous Fungus Frenzy
• …and more!

name: Noclip VR
description: Noclip VR is a co-op multiplayer backrooms game with unique locomotion and gameplay. The game has many unique levels and entities from the backrooms.

name: Rumble Heroes
description:
The sole princess of the kingdom was kidnapped by the dark knights!
Your heroes are the only hope.

In order to save the princess, you need to start with reconstructing the village.
Collect trees, mine ore, and construct buildings to improve the village.
Furthermore, you can recruit new heroes at the pub.
Recruit and raise legendary heroes that use various skills!
Discover treasure and obtain various monsters and resources through huge open areas.
Hundreds of monsters appear in the dungeon.
But don't worry! The heroes you trained can wipe out the monsters!
Now, forget about the collectible RPGs that are complicated and full of manual, time consuming grinding.
You can move several heroes with just one hand.
Jump into the fun, fast paced hack-and-slash combat with simple controls!

name: Fish Kingdoms
description:
One day, the Procrastinator lay flat in the living room, day-dreaming about all the great things they could do in the world...
Some fish showed up in the dreams, wearing costumes and makeups. Arms and legs grew out of their body as they charged one after another at something in the kitchen. One looked like Lü Bu and one looked like Zhang Fei. It was incredibly bizarre and strange, but somehow, they didn't want someone else to dictate their fate.

name: Des Visages, Des Fissures
description: It is a biographical top view game of the French metal band Desybes, based on a narrative puzzle, in a retro style. The player embodies Aëlice, a little girl plagued by night terrors who will have to survive and chain nightmare nights.

name: TheCube
description: 2D Arcade Game.

name: Taxi Taxi Sim
description: Hello, Taxi? I urgently need to get to Avenue 14.

name: Mauri Mursu's Hangover
description: Help Mauri Mursu on his adventure on the Walrus Islands and cure his hangover!

name: Creatures of the Deep
description:
Disturbing news is coming from all over the world about mysterious monsters from the deep.
You need to reach out to the local people and investigate. You don't have much time!
Join Anglers across the globe and travel through the world's most exotic fishing locations, cast a fishing line and catch record fish, sea creatures, underwater treasures and even some monsters.

name: Nameless: The Departed Cycle
description: Nameless: The Departed Cycle is a dark fantasy/horror visual novel with LGBTQ+ elements. Make choices to determine Israh's fate, and strive to survive -- perhaps even slay -- the monster stalking the Umbral Forest.

name: OlliOlli World: Finding the Flowzone
description: OlliOlli World: Finding the Flowzone is the final expansion that can be purchased individually or as part of the OlliOlli World Expansion Pass or OlliOlli World Rad Edition. OlliOlli World base game is required to play expansions. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 9
description: Includes 3 new stages.

name: The Vanishing Hitchhiker
description: The legend tells the story of a young girl who appears mysteriously on dangerous curves of the road. Make different choices to discover all the alternate endings and find out how the story unfolds.

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - FGK DLC 1
description:
Includes:
- 5 outfits for Noby and Friends
- 8 types of furniture
- 1 mini-storyllllllllllllllllllllllllllll

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - Special Edition
description:
Includes:
- Base game
- Season Pass including outfits for Noby and Friends, furniture, and mini-stories
- Season Pass bonus: Premium Crops Seed Set
- Special Edition bonus: Seasonal Veggies Seed Set

name: Lighten Up
description: Lighten Up is a bite-sized logic puzzle game. Exercise your brain as you drag and drop puzzle pieces to victory!

name: Automatic War
description: "Automatic War" is a cool auto battler. You are not in control of the battle process itself, but you can influence the outcome of the battle before the battle begins. Choose wisely and feel the excitement of fights!

name: Şükür
description: Şükür, It is a horror-thriller game with a first-person story. From the moment you enter the game, you will feel that you are alone in the forest and you will try every way to escape.

name: My Needy Neighbour Girls
description: You're the only man in the building and all your neighbours are girls who need your help, and they're all hot! They're completely helpless when it comes to fixing anything around the house, so you'll have to look after them whenever they need something.

name: The Monkey P
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Spell: Written in the Stars - Aslan's Story
description:
Love Spell: Aslan's Route is the first DLC for Love Spell: Written In The Stars. It features the story and the ability to romance a brand-new bachelor, Aslan the Wizard, who was not playable in the original game.

Follow Luna's adventure through different worlds when she accidentally ends up chasing the mysterious pink-haired wizard named Aslan through a magical portal and straight into a parallel universe!

name: Budgie Genetics Simulator
description: Breed budgies and discover hidden colour mutations in this realistic genetics simulator.

name: Sumikko Gurashi: Minna de Rhythm Party
description: Sumikko Gurashi: Minna de Rhythm Party is a rhythm game that you can enjoy with your friends and family, by pressing buttons and shaking the Joy-Cons to the rhythm of the music. You can play thrilling rhythm games in a variety of settings, such as tennis court, hot spring, ship, and music festival venue. Of course, you can also enjoy the various cosplay outfit of Sumikko.

name: Wandering Duelist
description: The Wandering Duelist is a single-player, narrative-driven adventure game that tells a story of love, conflict and reckless actions. The story takes place on a small and lively planet, where its residents carry on their daily activities that often pose dangers and obstacles for the player.

name: Dark Maidens
description: Dark Maidens is a side scrolling action game where you fight through hordes of enemies to test your metal against the strongest of foes. It has an advanced combat system in which you can light attack, heavy attack, block, fake out, and dodge. Don't expect an easy win as the enemies fight back!

name: Spellbook Demonslayers
description:
Spellbook Demonslayers is a roguelite horde survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors and Path of Exile.

Slay thousands of demons with powerful magic to protect the Cosmic Library! Choose new spells and upgrades every run to create overpowered builds with each character, and steal the powers of defeated enemies to destroy the demonic horde.

name: Shatter Remastered Deluxe
description:
Shatter returns in stunning 4K resolution running at 120fps, with a modernised UI, and multiple visual improvements. Re-experience the highly acclaimed original soundtrack, remixed and remastered in 5.1 surround sound.
Travel through 10 distinct worlds and battle 9 unique bosses; packed with amazing physics effects, power-ups and special attacks. Take control of the playing field with the innovative “suck and blow” mechanic, altering the game to your benefit and charging up ultimate ability SHARDSTORM.

name: Goal!: The Club Manager
description: You are more than a coach. You are the undisputed club boss. Are you ready to dominate the league with your team in this re-imagining of the classic sports management franchise? Could you be the next manager sensation? Prove it!

name: The Past Within
description: The Past Within is the new co-op experience from Rusty Lake! Play together with someone you deem trustworthy: one in The Past, the other in The Future. Observe and communicate what you see around you. Solve the puzzles and uncover Albert Vanderboom’s plan.

name: TFM: The First Men
description:
TFM: The First Men is a strategy simulation enriched with character-driven base building, party-based exploration, and tactical real-time with pause combat. Inspired by the creation stories, Knights and Merchants, and Rimworld.

Build your settlement with the help of various paths and crafts. Use countless traits, items, and skills to make the first men in your image. Raise and train children and shape their future into becoming heroes. Gather your party to explore outer regions and exploit your findings. Meet authentic cultures, obtain quests and answer pleas for help. Fight through dungeons, encounter deadly boss fights, and loot hidden treasures.

name: Traha Global
description: Traha Global is RvR MMORPG based on the confrontation between two major factions. You can play multiple roles, create unique builds of your character based on unlimited class transition system. Based on vast open world, you can go on adventures in various regions, get items through raid dungeons.

name: Depths of Sanity
description:
A mysterious signal. A missing crew. And the one man trying to piece it all together.

As Abe Douglas, dive deep into a fully underwater metroidvania to explore massive oceanic biomes, battle monstrous bosses, and piece together a mystery that threatens not only your crew, but your own sanity.

name: Rough Waves
description: Maintaining peace and order on the remote archipelagos of the Cordial Union is not an easy job, and the crew of the patrol hovercraft "Tomato Sardine" certainly have their hands full with all kinds of mercenaries, pirates and mad scientists marauding, plundering and swindling across their beat. It's up to you to uphold justice and wreck stuff in this retro-style vehicular action game made on GZDoom engine.

name: Hotel Infinity
description: You run a hotel—that infinite hotel that philosophers and mathematicians like to theorize about. Taking care of your guests is your top priority. Most of them are ghosts.

name: Goldsphere: Completion
description:
Year of 2008. After the second disaster, the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone continues to expand.. More and more people end up either dead, or missing. Scientific expeditions and military operations only result in failure. The few whom survived, often talk about these so-fantastic anomalous formations and mutated animal species.. with all sorts of amazing abilities. The term “S.T.A.L.K.E.R.” just only begins to become a thing.

18th of August, 2008. A young adventure seeker travels to the Exclusion Zone with one mission in mind.. to find the legendary "Wish Granter". However, the true purpose of his journey is known only by him…

What may await our hero on his adventures? You may only find out yourself...

name: Memory of The Waters
description: Duke is lost in a snowy wilderness (probably because of alcohol). He stumbles heroicly around and discovers all sorts of eerie locations.

name: Doomed: By the Hour
description: A full megawad of speedmaps that were (mostly!) made in an hour or less, for NaNoWADMo 2022! The standard 30 maps are split evenly between us, with Map31 being a collaboration and Map32 being a guest map by gabirupee!

name: Seoul Apocalypse
description: Stylish action and ultimate excitement while breaking through the stages with the best deck combination!

name: The Deep Ones
description:
In a mysterious little town, inhabited by a strange tackle shop owner, the deep waters are stirring...

Explore the foggy landscape and try to fill out your fish species logbook. Purchase items and upgrades to help you catch stronger and rarer fish. But beware, these fish won't be caught without a fight - they may just drag you down with them!

name: Disintegration
description: A 2-minute game about a doctor's appointment.

name: Paintball Arena
description:
Fun multiplayer game to play with your friends or meet new ones in the platform. WebBrowse, you play with your keyboard and mouse. The first one that makes 10 kills win and ends the game. You can collect weapons and ammo by passing on top of them. Once you are killed you have to look for a water fountain to clear that paint.
This is NFT game, so you need to have your metamask wallet in polygon connected if you have NFTs. You can also play without buying any NFT. Everyone can play for free.
You can play and participate in differente Leagues according to your level and also can join a club and play with your club mates.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Firesong
description: Set sail for Galen as the Legacy of the Bretons year-long story comes to a close! A druid civil war erupts and followers of the True Way vie for the legacy of the Druid King. Unite with new allies to make the Systres safe once and for all.

name: Our Shared Lie
description:
You are a wolf.

You wake up in a strange gravel-filled field on the massive edge of a cliff. Unable to remember anything, you accept the help of a mysterious, but kind and energetic lion. Now you know that you aren't alone and other seven people share your same state of mind. And none of you know where you are.

Explore a strange new (or familiar?) place surrounded by questions. Search for answers in the desolate facilities, learn the vast history of the world and find a way to escape in the process.

name: Pokémon Black 2 Kaizo
description: Pokémon Black 2 Kaizo is a mod that rebalances the experience, aiming at trying to bring the VGC doubles experience to the main campaign of the game. Giving the player unlimited healing and rare candies, the goal is to form your own team as easily as possible and beat trainers with their own unique strategies and synergies.

name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever - Reveal the Power
description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever - Reveal the Power is mobile exclusive browser game by McDonald's made to promote the movie Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.

name: My Magical Boyfriend
description:
Your beloved grandfather just made you the manager of his apartment complex, but between its bad reputation and strange phenomena, the building is in danger of being demolished…

As if that wasn't enough to deal with, you quickly discover that the complex is a hub for magical beings from distant realms! Now it's up to you and your tenants—a delinquent dragon, a shut-in elf, and an eccentric beastman—to stop your home from being redeveloped. Can you get them to trust you and work together before it's too late?

name: Fuck Hitler
description: You go back in time 80 years. In front of you lies a half-conscious Adolf Hitler. You know he can't move, can't defend himself. To your right lies a brand-new MP44 and a set of grenades, to your left a large sawblade and a gallows. You know what to do.

name: Peek a Boo
description: Multiple boy-scouts get pushed inside an abandoned house to pass courage challenges. What they don't know though is that Ethel, the girl that organizes the challenges, hides a monstrous secret inside the house. Play in the role of one of the unlucky boy-scouts: collect keys, wander through the rooms without making sound, hide in the darkness and run away from the demon that resides in the cursed house.

name: Queen Beast
description:
Humble miller Otto's quiet days are thrown into chaos when he emerges from his bed one morning to discover his sister Bronwyn has been kidnapped!

The person responsible is a mysterious knight in dark armor; the only clue he left behind is a bag of gold coins bearing the profile of an unknown woman.

Joining forces with the beautiful and enigmatic adventurer Switch, and the mischievous fairy Echo, our hero sets out on a journey through the forgotten places of his native land in search of the dark knight and the sinister forces that power him. But on his way, Otto will discover much more than he anticipated in this story of romance, non-stop action and adventure!

name: Bubbles Swimsuit
description: Play the classic bubble pop game, match 3 colors until clean the levels. In reward for solving the puzzles you can discover new girls in an adventure pixelated.

name: Sunny Place 2
description: Battle against chaotic bullet hell bosses with online strangers (or friends!) Customize your outfit or make and upload a boss for others to enjoy!

name: Videopac Collection 1
description: Experience late 1970s gaming with this collection of 10 games for the Philips Videopac G7000 (aka the Magnavox Odyssey 2). From battling invading aliens in space, to leading your team to victory on the baseball field, to turning into a swarm of killer bees, this pack has it all.

name: Defending Lydia Collier
description: Lydia Collier has been charged with the murder of her billionaire husband after he mysteriously vanished, and it is your job to prove her innocence. Find evidence, follow leads, make decisions and crack the case, and whilst you do it date and find love in London as a newly single, wealthy lawyer.

name: Naomi's Exhibition
description: During a local holiday, Naomi was called to update the security camera system. Taking advantage of the cameras have been turned off, she decides to put her fetish into action.

name: Scurvy Dogs
description: An online Player v Player battle!

name: Super Crazy Chickens
description: Help this crazy team of chickens to get the mysterious green eggs while adding more and more members to the adventure. Discover all the secrets, challenge the fearsome bosses or simply create the best levels in Super Crazy Chickens.

name: Simantik
description: First-person action with an open world, steampunk and RPG elements, many types of weapons, both firearms and cold weapons, as well as steam or electric ones to confront hordes of enemies.

name: Station 117
description: In an undisclosed location, somewhere on the floor of the Pacific ocean, is Station 117 - a classified research facility doing totally secret work. What you discover will change everything.

name: Justice For All
description: A 2D side-scroller shooter

name: The Quarry: '50s Throwback Character Outfits
description: Travel back in time with your favorite counselors!

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Shy-Girl
description: Boyfriend somehow ended up on Yoshi's Island but he soon noticed that this isn't the normal Yoshi's Island he loved as a kid.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Garden Puzzle
description: Choose 1 of 8 pictures and put them together from 6, 12 or 24 pieces. Through great fun, take care of your children's small motor development, teach them patience and perseverance.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Forest Puzzle
description: Choose 1 of 8 pictures and put them together from 6, 12 or 24 pieces. Through great fun, take care of your children's small motor development, teach them patience and perseverance.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Character Collection 1 & 2
description:
Enjoy the critically acclaimed LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga with more heroes and villains. Explore the galaxy with over 400 characters in Character Collection 1 and 2.

Includes:
Character Collection 1:
Classic
Trooper
Mandalorian Season 1
Mandalorian Season 2
The Bad Batch
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Solo: A Star Wars Story

Character Collection 2:
Obi-Wan Kenobi
Andor
The Book Of Boba Fett
The Clone Wars
Rebels
Summer Vacation

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Deluxe Edition
description: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia is ideal for born explorers. Wandering around the lively boards, you’ll find animals and plants by yourself. Using a magnifying glass, you can reveal cards that contain interesting information and drawings.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Clone Wars Character Pack
description:
Intergalactic dogfights and defense against Separatist raids aren't the only fun you'll have! Play as veteran heroes and villains from Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

Characters Include:

Captain Rex
Darth Maul (Clone Wars)
Asajj Ventress
Savage Opress
Gar Saxon

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Summer Vacation Character Pack
description:
Ahh, a vacation is just what you need from Stormtroopers and TIE fighters. Celebrate the holidays, LEGO Star Wars style, with iconic characters in their beach wear.

Characters Include:

Finn
Darth Vader
The Emperor
R2-D2
Obi-Wan Kenobi

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Character Collection 2
description:
Enjoy the critically acclaimed LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga with more heroes and villains. Expand your collection with 6 new downloadable character packs and play as heroes and villains from the galaxy.

Includes
Obi-Wan Kenobi
Andor
The Book Of Boba Fett
The Clone Wars
Rebels
Summer Vacation

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Pond Puzzle
description: Choose 1 of 8 pictures and put them together from 6, 12 or 24 pieces. Through great fun, take care of your children's small motor development, teach them patience and perseverance.

name: Driverio 2
description: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Chaqs
description: Chaqs is an instructive CTF (Capture The Flag) game that performs the basic functions of an operating system. While it meets your expectations from an operating system to a certain extent with the applications it contains, Chaqs progresses in the direction of more challenges in terms of gameplay.

name: Fairyside
description: A dark fantasy roguelike shoot-em-up with lots of bullet hell featuring cute pixel art, visual novel interludes, and story-driven gameplay. Join Shirley in her journey to learn magic and survive Redwood Academy!

name: Apex Legends: Eclipse
description: The new map Broken Moon has a fierce defender: meet Catalyst and see the brutal beauty of Cleo in Apex Legends:

name: Hive Spy Remi: Mind Control Madness
description:
A Saturn-like style game for the 2022 32-bit Game Jam!

Remi returns! While packing up for a vacation, a mad scientist invaded the hive with mind-controlled Hornets and is trying to get to the Queen! Help Remi prevent the kidnapping of the Queen and save the hive. Sneak past enemies and knock them out to progress.

name: Super Mando
description: Platform game in pixel art 2D where you can run, jump, dodge obstacles and crush enemies, a challenging retro adventure

name: Patagon
description: Patagon is a first person open world VR Steam Punk adventure shooter. It's fun and easy to play. The game takes place in an alternate steampunk reality where the British empire has never ended. Battle giant monsters and dinosaurs while you explore Sand Dollar island.

name: Candice DeBebe's Tantalising Tricks
description: The third entry in the stunningly scandalous sorceress's story, in the form of a turn-based RPG.

name: What They Don't Sea
description: Traverse the depths of the ocean in this beautiful 2D pixel platformer, but be sure to watch your air levels! What They Don't Sea has a wonderful mix of beautiful and creepy environments, with drops of humor delivered by charming ocean creatures.

name: Rat Shoot
description: Your goal is simple, stop any rats from escaping. Shoot the rats as they invade the room! It gets tenser by the second as the rat invasion grows. Be quick on the trigger to shoot them before they escape!

name: Last Kids on Earth: Hit the Deck!
description: The Monster-Zombie Apocalypse means no homework, no parents, and no rules! Become zombie-fighting, monster-bashing heroes in this action-packed rogue-like strategy card game.

name: Piranha
