description: Trotting through deserts, snow and forests to enter a portal by killing the Piranhas using abilities, combat and pickups

name: Under the Shack
description: Please don't let the fact I used RPG Maker Discourage you from buying the game its cheap and fun. It is also the first part to a larger series i am working on!

name: Tractor Journey
description: Join this Tractor Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: The Quest for the Candies
description: This is a Halloween-themed hack that was started in 2019 and finished in 2022. There are 34 exits, spread across 5 worlds.

name: This is Hell
description: Taking inspiration from rage-games like Getting Over It, Jump King, and Pogostuck, This is Hell is a frustrating experience with difficult controls. Each of the 2 joysticks on your controller move his massive fists, and your goal is to reach the pearly gates above. What awaits you in eternal paradise?

name: Routemania
description: Routemania is a relaxing, colorful puzzle game where you build routes around the world. Solve 25+ puzzles by discovering the most efficient way to connect cities using your available pieces.

name: Hand Simulator: Rendezvous
description: Hand Simulator: Rendezvous is game for adult fans of the series. Create appointments. Play with friends tete-a-tete or a big group. Chat or do something hot.

name: AI: Art Impostor
description: AI: Art Impostor is the brand new party AI drawing game. You are an artist who commands AI to draw new artwork. You and other artists will collaborate in preparing for the next exhibition, but one of you doesn't know its theme. You should find a fake artist without being doubted by other artists.

name: Aevumblade Chronicles
description: The Aevumblade Chronicles is an action role-playing game that embarks a grand journey with Marcus and his friends. Join them as they explore and battle through a series of challenges throughout the world of Eirensia. They are set in a mission to restore and save the world from its demise.

name: Two Cars Stunts Edition
description: What do you know about synchronization? Here is an example when not everything depends on you.

name: Fraim
description: Fraim is a fun survival rhythm aim trainer that makes you improve faster by challenging you to your fullest by introducing difficulties and level overrides. Miss too many targets and it's game over! Focused mostly on fast small adjustment shots which are highly relevant for in high-skilled FPS.

name: Foretales: Deluxe Edition
description: Foretales Foretales offers a unique take on the adventure genre, with a multitude of playstyles and story paths through which you can save the world… or bring about its end.

name: Future Mirror
description: "Ten years from now, I will be dead..." A coming-of-age fantasy adventure tale, Future Mirror is a visual novel that explores fate and the choices that affect our future, tragedy, relationships, and happiness.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Galactic Edition
description: The Galactic Edition includes 6 new packs in Character Collection 2, plus the 7 original packs from Character Collection 1.

name: Skate Rift
description: An immersive first person skateboarding simulator set on an island, interconnected by many courses and rifts.

name: RotatePDF: A Corporate Tale
description: Explore the liminal corridors of a company that only... rotates documents? This short artistic Indie title combines 2D exploration with paper physics to create a truly unique experience.

name: Little Hellions
description: 4 friends. 1 weirdo mechanic. Throw away your friends with your trusty Trick Hook in this passive aggressive fighter where you can’t fight!

name: The Hideaway
description: The Hideaway is an exploration and discovery low-poly game with Hardcore survival mechanics. Lost and wandering in the wilderness without food, water and weapons, your objective will be to survive and contact an aid center as soon as possible without harming your environnement in any way

name: Steamcore
description: A brand new genre FPS set in the future, in which players must invade and conquer planets representing live channels on Twitch.

name: Rainy Butcher
description: On rainy nights, the serial murderer is on a killing spree. This scares everyone but one girl, the journalist who keeps digging for a promotion. Dauntless, she gets involved deep and wide, hoping to discover the real identify of the rainy night butcher.

name: Chonky: From Breakfast to Domination
description: Cute characters, cuddly enemies and an all together chonky world. Fight your way through adorable monsters, collect all kinds of loot and find new spells to help you on your journey. Face the dangers alone or with a companion that can assist you as an even cuter baby Chonky.

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom
description: Doraemon, Noby and their friends land on an unknown planet and decide to help a new friend fulfill his dreams—by farming! Plow the fields, harvest crops and tend to the animals. You can even use Doraemon’s secret gadgets to farm in a flash! Relax by living with friends, eating delicious meals and fishing. And with local play, you and a pal can build a ranch together!

name: Lenny Loosejocks in Space
description: You guide Lenny and Donga in their epic quest to save the human race from the evil Sluggees. It's the groundbreaking point-and-click web adventure game sequel to Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1998.

name: Pokaban
description: Push cards strategically into marked positions to create a poker hand. Beat the dealer's hand to win. Sokoban with poker mechanics.

name: Faith
description: Welcome to Faith, a new survival first person, exploration game where you can go explore your whereabouts, check the highest mountain, swim across the shores, but when night comes, you will have to escape into your trusty spaceship to escape extreme storms.

name: It's Kooky
description: It's Kooky is a beautiful hand drawn game filled with unusual/silly but likeable characters and items. Make sure you find all of the quirky doodles before the ticking clock stops!!

name: Circloo
description: A physics platformer with growing circular levels.

name: Eternal Evil
description: A small town is being taken over by ghouls. Solve puzzles, carefully read notes and use various weapons against horrific and evolving enemies to uncover what is behind this gruesome event. Eternal Evil is an old-school survival-horror game.

name: Danger Forever
description:
Danger Forever is 3D Shoot'Em Up with RPG elements. Lone human rides her mecha-dragon through a hostile world of mechanoids and techno-demons.

Unlike most scrolling shooters, you fly through a 3D environment — use it to your advantage, and beware of bumping into walls or ground. Also, instead of traditional showering enemies with bullets, you must think ahead a bit - the fuel/heat system adds more depth to combat.

name: Lonesome Village
description:
Lonesome Village is a cozy, quiet town struggling to rebuild after a strange calamity wiped out their homes.

Take the role of Wes the coyote and help bring this village back from the brink of destruction in a puzzle-filled life sim!

name: Match Match Mania!
description: Compete head to head in this exciting FPS Match-3 MOBA!

name: ReThink 4
description: ReThink 4 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

name: For a Vast Future
description: War has ended in Seralia, but the scars are far from healed. Explore a dystopian landscape and build weapons from scrap parts to use in battle. Recruit companions and travel in style in your trusty motorbike as you uncover the depths of a deep government conspiracy. The future is vast.

name: Plot of the Druid
description: Make earthquakes. Turn night into day. Transform into a small furry creature. No one can party like a druid. An adventure game with sarcastic British humor and classic, hand-drawn art.

name: Skies of Chaos
description: A retro shoot em' up for iOS, Android + more. Battle and obliterate an Evil Empire.

name: Paradiddle
description: Play drums in VR without the limitations of the real world. With 50+ realistic percussion instruments, a built-in rhythm game mode and lineup of lessons, Paradiddle's Version 1.0 release makes it easier and more fun than ever to learn how to drum.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Valentines Day
description: Unforgettable love affair waits you in New Holiday Jigsaw! 500 amazing and cute photos!

name: Bones in the Boneyard
description: There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them and line up complete skeletons to set them free.

name: Generic Fishing Game
description:
Sit back and enjoy a peaceful afternoon on the lake, fishing while surrounded by nature. Catch over 3 different types of fish as you fill your entire Fishing Encyclopedia.

Try to get the biggest fish from the lake, but most importantly: have a nice, relaxing time.

name: MBOS
description: MBOS.wad is a 13 map wad created during NaNoWADMo, with main inspirations from NoReason's NoSp (Map31) JAM by Vortale, Judgment by Rayziik and 1 bad wad by Spendoragon

name: Luigi's Mansion: Halloween Haunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Halloween Hero
description: The story of one child's attempt to reclaim their lost Halloween.

name: Luigi's Mansion: Sweet Home
description: Sin descripción

name: PolarDread
description:
PolarDread is a horror game inspired by games in the Sit And Survive Genre that takes the concept provided in the game and flips it on its head several times, throwing the trailer into tense situations where they will need to act on their feet to avoid bloodthirsty mascots in a winter-themed resort.

Hide under a desk from a massive mechanical bear, throw objects, or even the mascots themselves, close doors, vents, and keep your barring until the clock strikes six.

name: Halloween Experience 3: GGen
description: A short spooky game filled with suprises and references made by a solo dev. You might think it's almost a parody, and you could be right.

name: Tactus
description: Sin descripción

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Sun and Moon of Teyvat Pack
description:
A mod that adds 2 leaders from Genshin Impact, Klee & Nahida, alongside their respective civilizations, Mondstadt and Sumeru. Features:

- Unique districts (Favonius Stronghold & Akademiya)
- Unique units (Reconnaissance Company & Jumpy Dumpty)
- Unique city project (Fish Blasting Carnival)
- Unique WMD (Pounding Surprise)
- Features music from Genshin Impact
- And much more!

name: Spookynakki
description:
Clear level after level of monsters, using the very blocks you stand on as your only weapon. Can you defeat every foe without falling through the shrinking foundation?

Spookynakki is the bone-chilling continuation of Grabanakki, featuring 3 new worlds, a variety of new and returning mechanics, and a completely new OST.

name: Concrete Meltdown
description: Medium / large base map with lots of lava. Built on progs_dump 3.0 (already included). Custom music is "Scratch My Surface" by Verbum Mentis. Map source is included.

name: God is in the Radio
description:
you are death, one of 22 members of the major arcana, a cult dedicated to some far-off god. the night is halloween, and you watch in scorn as the unknowing dance among devils and dress to indulge in sin. the high priestess receives a message from the all-mighty himself: the arcana must gather in an abandoned house and find his song on an old radio receiver. by finding his gift, he will grant you the life, eternal, and the world will finally be able to hear his light.

are you scared of what's to come? do you doubt the cult and its god? or do you embrace it with open arms?

name: Mayhem 2022: Memento Moron
description: MAYhem 2022: MEMENTO MORON is a 28-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums. It is the tenth installment in the MAYhem series and was led by James Caldwell (Obsidian). The stated intention of this year's installment was to homage the projects from the first 10 years of Doom mapping, with a resource pack comprised of textures from the IK Texture pack, Hellcore 2.0 and the Malice total conversion for Quake.

name: The Lost Magic
description: This mapset was produced during NaNoWADMo and contains 32 Boom (CL9) maps with heavy DeHackEd shenanigans. The difficulty is a lot more on the softer side with a decent ramp up, so if you've just beat Doom 2 on UV, you can give this a crack!

name: Strato-Spear
description: Strato-Spear is an 3d character action/hack and slash game, with freeform combos and movement. It is inspired by games like Devil May Cry and Super Smash Bros.

name: For a Reason
description:
For A Reason is a sapphic visual novel set in a witch's academy setting featuring two playable characters and one route for each character. Talk to your crush, solve a mystery, and... drink some juice?

Play as Jane Laguerre, a member of arts and performance club who doesn't have the guts to even walk on the stage, and help navigate her way to confess to her idol. Or play as Lora Wiley and have a cute totally-not-date with her 'friend' who is better than her in every way!

name: Toga
description: Dai is a little boy who unwittingly enters another world after investigating a suspicious door. At first glance, it looks like a stranger's house...

name: Irritating Ship
description: Navigate a winding corridor filled with obstacles in this new precision-movement game for the NES, rotating your ship and accelerating forward in the frictionless environment of space. Three difficulties determine the number of lives gained from each checkpoint, and gravity can be toggled on for additional challenge. A secret ending and hidden mode can be uncovered by the most skilled of players.

name: Corrupted
description: Corrupted is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where you explore Amnesty's dreams.

name: Ducenti-Quinquaginta-Sexordle
description: A daily word guessing game where players must guess 256 different hidden words. Each guess reveals information about the hidden words. Free play and historical replay modes are also available.

name: Bone2.exe: Life After Death
description: Bone2.exe is a sequel to Bone.exe. It is a fast paced precision platformer 2d side-scrolling shooter.

name: Torcurus
description: Play as a turtle in this retro inspired adventure game! After you was born you found strange shrimp, that starts your adventure.

name: Nuggie House: Cerberus
description: Choose a realm of terror; the childish yet vibrant world of Snoocoland, the mundane halls of a high school, or the grand imagining of a wishful mind's dream mansion. Step carefully though, they might hear you.

name: NeonNoir
description: NeonNoir is a hybrid point-and-click adventure/visual novel game for the Amiga 1200.

name: Guntner
description:
Rescue the sickly life of a dingle whilst surviving high octane shoot ‘em up arcade action. Chauffeur the visibly distraught alien’s ailing pet through a wormhole shortcut colloquially known as “the 13th dimension”. Test your mettle, wits, and lightning trigger reflexes against various and sundry subconscious projections. It is a race against time!
Save the dingle!

name: The Last Monday
description: This lasagna-loving feline has gotten locked out of the house and needs your help!

name: Zero Visibility
description: A chilling cosmic horror game about four friends that get lost in a blizzard.

name: Batty Zabella
description: A horror point-and-click game made with 30% nostalgia, and 70% sass.

name: Yanvania 2022
description: Yanvania 2022 is a Halloween themed game based on Yandere Simulator created by YandereDev for Halloween 2022. The game is a parody of Castlevania, and a re-imagining of the game parody of Yanvania: Senpai of the Night that YandereDev made in 2015.

name: Hell Let Loose: Anniversary Edition
description:
Over the past year, millions have heard the battle cry and risen to fight in this epic WWII first person shooter.

Join the masses, where you and your teammates will face off against 50 other skilled soldiers, playing unique important roles, on a series of iconic battlefields.

name: War of Gold 2 Mission 99
description: Gold are again stolen so you super hero need destroy enemy army and find stolen gold at 10 different locations

name: Sherlock and Watson: A Study in Scarlet
description: Step in the shoes of Sherlock Holmes or Dr. Watson and venture on a journey filled with intrigue and mystery. Use your logic and teamwork skills in order to solve the mysterious murder which shocked the 19th century London. Play it with a friend on 2 devices with an open voice connection.

name: Embers of the Zombie Battlemage: Halloween - Real Werewolves of Massachusetts
description: Adds a new guest to the base game, as well as new story content for Leo!

name: Post-Shift 2
description: Post-Shift 2 is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame project set in an alternate universe from the original FNAF games by Scott Cawthon. Acting as a continuation of the previous fangame, Post-Shift.

name: Football Life 2023
description: Football Life 2023 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on pes21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Hype Prototype
description:
Hype Prototype is a 3D arena third-person shooter in the prototype style. Endless bullets make the game as dynamic as possible. Each level consists of a separate arena, you need to pass it and get into the portal. The game is great for training your aim.

Each level consists of a separate arena, you need to pass it and get into the portal. Along the way you will meet various enemies, power-ups, coins, first aid kits.

Three types of weapons are available to you at any time: revolver, shotgun and rifle. Each weapon has its own characteristics. Endless bullets make the game as dynamic as possible. You just need to aim and press the button.

The quality of passing the level affects the final grade. Your score is entered into the global leaderboard

name: The Extraterrestrials Museum of Earth Exploration
description: The alien lifeforms welcome you to The Extraterrestrial Museum of Earth Exploration! Get lost in the exhibits, meet new friends and take up a job at the museum to help these aliens learn about Earth from a real-life Earthling!

name: Slugmania
description: Worldeater Slug is threatening the world and the only way to beat it is to gather and train a team of diverse, friendly slugs! Slugmania is a cute, fast-paced, creature-collection roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Space Cheetah Hyper Runner
description: Surf solar panels, bounce off trampoline nets, play low G space soccer, and beat your best times in the most exhilarating future sports event this side of Pluto! Full 3D, sandbox levels, and multiple game modes to master. This is it - the Hyper Games await!

name: Each Other
description: In this new puzzle game, guide Edwin and Judy through an original story and many levels. And help them to avoid the eye of the supervisors and to escape from their orphanage for the least strange...

name: The Temple Of
description:
The Temple Of is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler game. It is 3D, procedurally generated, and packed with ancient horror around every corner! Use your torch to find secret passageways, treasures, and mysteries all while avoiding (or seeking?) the supernatural. Explore ever changing environments, from dusty and forgotten tombs to subterranean jungles.

Experience exploration like never before in a brand new horror adventure beneath the sands of Egypt! Grab your torch and load your pistol, for there's treasure to find, mysteries to solve, and nightmares to uncover.

name: Viking Gods
description:
Restore glory to the Nine Realms as you fight in an endless Ragnarök! Join forces with the goddess Freya to recover sacred relics stolen by Loki and scattered across the realms in this epic incremental clicker game.
The battle to end all battles has left Asgard in ruins. Rebuild your defenses by unlocking rooms to generate iron. Upgrade your rooms to increase production and rise through the halls of the Gods. Battle in Ragnarök again and again to reset progress, boost productivity, and conquer faster than ever!
Collect legendary Champions and tap to defend your rooms against invasion by mythical foes. Win XP to level up your Champions, maximize their stats and make them even more powerful. Take down powerful bosses then journey across the Bifrost bridge to expand across the Nine Realms!

name: Dreamland
description: Welcome to Dreamland! A town which hosts the wildest college spring break activities filled with hot girls, parties and sex. However, if you look close enough, you'll discover that Dreamland also hides a dark and horrifying mystery which haunts you and your friends...

name: My Time at Portia: Deluxe Edition
description:
Live your best life in the enchanting town of Portia. Restore your Pa's neglected workshop to its former glory, fulfill villager commissions, start your own farm or spend your days catching fish.

The Deluxe Edition includes a gift set, with exclusive items to help kickstart your new adventure.

name: Massi
description: Massi a retro pixel art game. It is the story of a Numidian king who lost his kingdom and fights to get it back. Massi is a performer with souls like and metroidvania features. A worthy descendant of 90s game: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap

name: Golf With Your Friends: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Golf With Your Friends: Deluxe Edition contains the main game as well as the following additional content to expand your experience:

Caddy Pack
Bouncy Castle Course Pack
Summery Party Cosmetics Pack
Racing Cosmetics Pack
Sports Cosmetics Pack

name: Aven Colony: Deluxe Edition
description: Build a new home for humanity in Aven Colony Deluxe Edition. Discover Aven Prime - an alien planet of deserts, tundras, and wetlands light years from earth. Build your colonies into massive, sprawling cities whilst dealing with the challenges faced when settling on a new world.

name: Pixel Paint
description: Pixel Paint is anything but a classic coloring book. The point of the game is for you to put your mind at ease, follow the numbers and fill every last pixel with a corresponding color. Sink into the gameplay loop of Pixel Paint.

name: Shanubis
description: You find yourself trapped alone in a pyramid, being hunted by an Egyptian God. Break containers to find what you need to survive and escape but stay quiet, Shanubis doesn't like trespassers. Just ask the rest of the research team...

name: Pot Breaker
description: You are the Pot Breaker - smash all 1000 pots if you are up for a relaxing challenge. Build up you character to quicken your progress and aid in fighting off the multiple enemies and obstacles in your way.

name: It's Locked
description: A horror game about fumbling with a bunch of keys to try escaping a pursuing monster though a series of locked doors

name: Inspector Detective: Private Eye
description: Everyone in town has their version of what happened at Timmons Manor. None of them were there. Everyone has their theories about why a Timmons relative has not set foot on the property in 100 years. None of them are correct...

name: The Apothecary
description: The realm depends on your help: mix ingredients and create potions to cure wild, fantastical illnesses that befall your fellow citizens. But be warned, you are all on your own. Enjoy figuring out which ingredients work and which don't -- curing or killing those who ask for your help!

name: Reality Noclip: The Backrooms
description: A research organization has finally found your lost tape. With that tape, it is proven that you weren't missing because you got lost, you noclipped out of reality. You have to get out of this place, an infinite maze with little to no escape. How will you escape this reality noclip?

name: The Book of Fredley
description: Gather the Pages, Reform the Book, and Harvest the innocent to defy The Reaper.

name: Dots in line
description: Dots in line - is a simple and clear puzzle game where colored dots should be joined in a row vertically or horizontally.

name: Ghostfriend
description: take care of your ghost friends until they're ready to leave this realm. In ghostfriend, you are in charge of taking care of wayward ghosts who aren't quite ready to leave the mortal realm. watch over them until they grow up and see them off into the afterlife!

name: Primordial Pain
description: Primordial Pain is a brutally unforgiving, fast paced arena shooter with one key mechanic: Pain. Perform an elegant dance on the fine line between maximum power and certain death.

name: Dreamwild
description: Dreamwild is a fast paced, Arcade-Styled FPS set in a multitude of unique and bizarre psychedelic worlds! Slice through the endless horde with your accursed sword, discover the secrets that the DreamWilds have to offer, and get to the bottom of the dark plague spreading through all Mindspace!

name: Luigi vs. Wario
description: Luigi must battle Wario in 4 different new worlds to save Peach in this hack.

name: Escape to the Caf
description: CAF is a horror game where you have to escape from CAF premises. Your goal is to survive and try to escape.

name: Book of Coin
description: Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy world that is inspired by traditional text-based adventure and interactive fiction games.

name: Three Quarters Space Station
description: "Three Quarters Space Station" is a free VR social game, featuring "Games Breaking the Ice, Happy Friendship", allowing players to meet friends and socialize in VR by playing various games.

name: Roost
description: Roost is a Low Poly First Person Exploration Game where you attempt to unravel the mystery of your new apartment. Roost mixes design philosophies of roguelites, adventure games, horror and those weird games you find on the internet to create a unique gameplay experience.

name: I Live Under Your House.
description: You are a monster under someone's house.

name: Kimi mo vtuber ni Naranai?
description: New free novel game "Will you become a vtuber too?" One day, you came to the virtual world Return to the real world? Or... would you make another choice? A story that changes depending on your choices.

name: Awakening of Legend
description: Awakening of Legend is a free, retro-inspired, rogue-like adventure with randomized loot, transferable perks and combat inspired by the Active Time Battle (ATB) system from old school JRPGs.

name: Spooky Halloween in the Voxel World
description: Welcome to the Voxel World! Halloween is about to begin and you are excited for your adventure! But remember, in this period, Voxel World is a dangerous place... Hunting season has begun! Don't forget your sword and always follow grandma's advice. The monsters won't go away alone...

name: Flappy Bat 2
description: It's a Halloween night and Flappy Bat is trying to make his way home. Can you help the Flappy Bat navigate through numerous procedurally generated obstacles. Flap your way past enemies and obstacles and compete on the global leader board for the ultimate top score!

name: The Halloween Story
description: This year you have been assigned to be the CEO of the Pumpkin farm. Start growing the pumpkin and become the biggest pumpkin farm in the world.

name: The Silent Huntress
description: "The Silent Huntress" is a visual novel in the genre of a dark fairy tale with choices and different endings. Not only the development of events will depend on your choices, but also the conclusions that the main character makes about her life and the world around her.

name: Silly Seance
description: It's a party game played on a spirit board! Two to four players join online using their mobile device, and non-verbally communicate to complete secret silly tasks. Complete all eight tasks and everyone wins together!

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition
description:
Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition includes:
- A replica case of the Tobin’s Spirit Guide
- An exclusive poster
- Stickers
- A display stand
- Advance Access to the Basher Ghost
- A rare Ectoplast Skin
- Ghostbusters RTV Kit Ghost Trap
- A special PKE Meter

name: The Nameless
description: A classic survival horror game with themes that are loosely based on the works of H.P. Lovecraft.

name: The Hunter's Journals: Wight Chapel Dreams
description: Revisit the case which made you a legend among your peers.

name: NekoNecro
description: Run! Jump! Double jump! Pounce and bounce! Meow! A fast-paced 2D platformer with a beautiful hand-drawn 90's graphic novel style.

name: Out of Ore
description: A casual heavy equipment experience. Mine ore, Move dirt, Build and repair.

name: Poptank
description: This is a pop cute Shooting game‼︎

name: KaRu
description: KaRu is a short, horror experience where you play as a Parasite. He wakes up next to a young boy he never met in a place they shouldn't be. Now they have to trust each other and find a way out. The game is about an hour long, and it has four endings! This is meant as an introduction to many more insights to come, taking place within the same universe, so, please do enjoy this little world!

name: Peak Darkness
description: Survive and defend your home or don't it really doesn't matter. What matters is sending those things back to where they came from. Use weapon upgrades, friends or whatever to do this just get it done.

name: Spider Tanks
description: Spider Tanks is a PVP Brawler. Players choose between a number of Tank Bodies and Weapons in the garage, then battle it out in one of the many Spider Tanks arena maps. Spider Tanks is free to play, but also incorporates a variety of play-to-earn mechanics, centering around skill-based competition, resource collection, and a player-driven upgrade cycle. Whether you want to play with a small group of close friends, or test your skill in high-stakes competition, Spider Tanks will be the worldwide play-to-earn esport for you. Purchase fully tradable Weapons, Tanks and Bodies in the Spider Tanks store for advantages to the upgrade cycle, rarity head starts and more.

name: Age of Jura
description: The Jurassic RTS dinosaur game. Prepare for an extinction in a long forgotten age, the Age of Jura, where humans are still living among dinosaurs. Take the human race to the top of the food chain. It's now or never: Kill or be killed.

name: Neon Abyss: Deluxe Edition
description: Do you think you have what it takes to be the boss? Then lock ‘n’ load with the Neon Abyss Digital Deluxe Edition!

name: Skull Chainz
description: Smash your way out of Hell in this unique physics-based combat game!

name: NecroBoy: Path to Evilship
description: NecroBoy: Path to Evilship tells the story of a young necromancer aiming to become the greatest Lord of Evil! Using his dark powers, he’s bringing his NecroMinions back to life to do his bidding and solve puzzles to venture forth into the crypt of his infamous hero, NecroMan!

name: If Fusion Were That Easy
description: "If Fusion Were That Easy" is a humorous 2.5D point-and-click adventure about cold fusion and preventing the apocalypse. Explore a diverse world, master tricky puzzles and stop the inevitable.

name: Super Lone Survivor
description: The masked protagonist must escape the city ravaged by disease, by any means necessary. Use stealth to scavenge food, or kill everything in your path. Nurture your mental health or descend into madness. How you survive is up to you.

name: A Gracewind Tale: The Leeds Murder
description:
The Leeds Murder is a direct sequel to "Do You Copy?" in the Gracewind Universe.

You play as a detective looking for a missing person lost in Gracewind Park. Use your investigative skills to find out the truth.

Discover more history of Gracewind as you discover the truth of Michael Leeds.

name: Soul Mates
description: Pursue love in the afterlife as a ghost in a town full of other single spirits. Court quirky characters, go on haunting dates, and find your soul mate.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Appendix I
description:
The figments of the forest swirled within this crucible of immense heat.

At the fulcrum between the exterior expanse,

and the encroaching frustration of the denizens…

Bulsifer came to exist.

Once the spirits of the forest, now a phantasm of the town.

Drift back through dreams of the town by speaking to your fellow phantoms in this small companion to Boreal Tenebrae Act I.

name: Raven's Gate
description: You start your journey as a hero in Golden Forest and your task is to go through world slain' enemies, collecting items and helping humans in quests.

name: Kuro
description: after a terrible incident, Kuro suffers from amnesia. A shrine appears in her head every night. Will she find the answer she seeks there?

name: Pal
description: A new mission awaits completion. Will you listen to Pal? Maintain your engine, lights, and oxygen levels while avoiding Pal and navigating towards destination

name: Of Frost and Flowers
description: An otome-fantasy visual novel. Play as Alto, a fearless knight, and enter a world of magic and myths with secrets waiting for you to unveil.

name: Rental
description: Rental is a short and spooky adventure game about the dangers of renting a house in an unknown place.

name: Detective Agency Gray Tie: Collector's Edition
description: Avi Games presents the first game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. This exciting hiden object game is packed with beautiful locations, diverse and interesting ways of searching for items, as well as new mini-games.

name: Hot Milf 9
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Artifacts and Antiquity
description:
After an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal from her previous line of work, our protagonist finds herself working security at the Stahl & Co. Shipping Company.
But soon a collection of strange artifacts cause the situation to take a dire turn...

name: Truck Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Truck Journey thorough the camping in the pimped pick up with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Welcome to Erin's Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
description: A game in the "Our Church and Halloween" series!

name: The Great Ghoul Duel 2
description:
Exploring one of several spooky maps, players must collect as many wandering spirit flames as they can in two minutes and return them to their homebase. After time’s up, the team that has collected the most spirit flames wins. But beware! - Opponents can intercept spirits from one another as they bring them back to homebase.

Players can choose to host a game with up to seven friends and family via a custom invitation link OR just play with randomized players around the globe. The team built several systems to enable this multiplayer gaming, all running on the Google Cloud Platform, including integrating Open Match, a highly-scalable, open source matchmaking framework cofounded by Google Cloud and Unity.

It looks like the ghost is clear—Let's Ghoul!

name: The Jumping Pumpkin: Halloween Edition - Turbo
description: Join Big P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Waking Knightmare
description: Become a Dream Walker in this high Adrenalin Knightmare! Push yourself to the limits on Single Player for a high score or challenge your friends in a battle with your Knightmares on your side. The choice is yours...

name: Math Tower 2
description: Math Tower is a game of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division for which you must run, jump and catch the correct answers in balls, bubbles, frogs and birds.

name: Nodrog's Fortress
description: Nodrog's Fortress is a Tactics-like Turn-Based All at Once Battler that features elements of Chess and American Football in a JRPG inspired package. Choose your Archmage, companions to fight for them, and try your hand in the 9 Story Missions, Local Pass and Play, PVP Online or in Survival mode, where there is no true Victory...

name: Coin Cascade
description:
Coin Cascade is a crowd-play game designed around the classic 2p Machine and is a traditional arcade game, We have two looks to the game which allows users to change the machine to different views.

Twitch streamers share the gameplay with their followers, interacting through chat and video. This is a gaming collision of Arcade 2p Machines and social video streaming at its finest, with a growing collection of playable Machines.

name: Leonor & Raúl: Halloween
description: Sin descripción

name: Domestic Dreams and Robots
description: Sin descripción

name: Sepia
description:
Sepia is a 34-map megawad (which started as a NaNoWadMo project) with maps ranging from lighter brown shade to darker brown shade. The mapset is mainly targeting DSDA-Doom (Woof should also handle it, but it wasn't tested), but GZDoom should work for the most part as well (use it at your own risk still, there might be more issues than i found).

The mapset is divided into 4 episodes with themes variying from the trench warfare of the WW1 to abstract solid-colored places in the void. Difficulty varies as well, with the wad starting fairly tame, but getting progressively harder both in movement department (episode 3 being heavy on the plaftoming side) and in combat department (episode 4 being heavy on the slaughter side).

name: Promethean Legacy
description: Promethean Legacy is a dice-rolling strategy game for the Commodore 64.

name: Eight
description: The world has been infected by deadly purple flowers. Eight lives are forever changed and they must come together to rid the world of this floral enemy.

name: Birdwatcher
description: Play as an aspiring cryptozoologist as you scour the scenic Mount Pallas National Park for definitive proof that the creature of local legend is more than just a myth.

name: Tkium Underground
description: Tkium Underground is a short horror escape game taking place in an unknown tunnels facility. Activate generators, levers, and find a specific object to unlock the exit door, then find it. You were not the first one to be in this situation, but will you be the first one to escape alive?

name: Sitri: Shadow Walk
description: As an agent of the Demon Lord's army who has infiltrated human society, you must seize the Holy Sword and carry out your mission.

name: OnlyFap Simulator 3
description: Take control of sexy cam model, rake in stacks of filthy internet money and attract as many fans as you can in this fast paced, click happy and thoroughly perverted take on the business tycoon / management sim genre!

name: Barji Kart
description: Race head-to-head against up to 9 friends in BarjiKart! Choose from different Items to aid you in finishing 1st place! Race in an arcade-style old school karting game where only one player may remain victorious!

name: Super Mario: The Daisyquest
description: Bowser’s cool uncle has kidnapped Daisy to show Bowser how it’s done, Mario has to fight through 4 new worlds to save her.

name: ColorMari
description: Colormari is a web-based multiplayer drawing game using enhanced tools and settings to give art enthusiasts the possibility to challenge themselves by trying to create the best artworks in a set time with a given prompt.

name: Halloween Shooter
description: A fun, classic, first-person shooter with a Halloween theme.

name: Path to Nowhere
description:
Welcome to Minos Bureau of Crisis Control.

As the Chief, you are obligated to Shackle and Control the most vicious outlaws—Sinners, to Protect the city from falling. Hold on to the light in the darkness and salvage hope from despair.

name: The Football Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Masterchef Cakes Edition
description: Your mission is to cook the best cookies in town!

name: Moshcave
description: Buff Murphy and obliterate hundreds of enemies as you crawl deep into the cave of Mr. Mosh! Moshcave is a retro-style action roguelite game with many different possible builds and strange enemies that gets progressively stronger.

name: Farewell Sen
description: Make friends with ghosts!

name: For What Will Come
description: Return to your childhood home in hopes to see your family, uncover the secrets behind your family's disappearance. What will you uncover? Will the family mystery end with you, or never be thought of again..

name: Utomah
description: Utomah is a 2D platformer in which the player navigates through a nightmarish world. Grapple, latch, and dash through incredible environments, discovering the darkness of one's inner mind, encountering true horrors along the way. Prepare to push your skills to the limit!

name: Genius vs. Antichrist 1
description: An amazing adventure game . Sometimes as a RPG

name: Bone's Cafe
description: Bone's café is a fast paced cooking game. Customize the layout of your kitchen to guarantee your success. Specialize your menu in ingredients and recipes to design your ultimate restaurant. Raise your customers from the dead, or invite your friends in this 4 player cooking adventure.

name: Butterfly Soup 2
description: Set a few months after the events of the original story, the game switches between the perspectives of Diya, Noelle, Akarsha, and Min-seo as they navigate high school life in the San Francisco Bay Area.

name: Monkey Kong
description: Monkey Kong is a very fun and addictive never-ending scrolling platform game. Jump from platform to platform and collect bananas that will give you energy to use as power-up and destroy all enemies and obstacles.

name: Grand Theft Auto Tightened Vice
description: GTA Tightened Vice is a sequel to the mod GTA III: Toughened, the goal of both mods is to make the game much more difficult.

name: Lord of doors
description: A quirky, emotional and tragic tale of love with cosmic horror. Created by Studio Lemi.

name: DCS World: MB-339
description: The MB-339 is a single engine, twin seat, Italian jet trainer and light ground support aircraft derived from the legendary MB-326 and designed during the Cold War. The aircraft entered service in the early 80's becoming the main training platform of the Italian Air Force.

name: Escape From Bunker
description: A near future in which mankind is threatened by a falling meteorite! And that to save humanity all are placed in bunkers, which are controlled by artificial intelligence! Something went wrong, and even after the danger has passed, the computer still decides that you have to stay locked up here forever...

name: Tenebra 2
description: An atmospheric puzzle game with rogue-like aesthetics for retro computers.

name: Lian'ai Qitan: Bu Cunzai de Zhenxiang
description: In River City, there is an ordinary milk tea shop, but with one peculiar thing about it - almost every day there is a huge line in front of it. Is it just due to its popularity? Or is someone specifically hiring people to stand in that line? And if the second is true, then what is the reason for this - is someone playing some dirty game against the owner of the tea shop, or is there even greater conspiracy behind all this?

name: Call of Duty: Endowment - Protector Pack
description: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Protector Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0.

name: Jake Everest: Wakanga The Unseen Civilization
description: Renowned archaeologist Jake Everest has found that recovering stolen and lost artifacts is a rewarding use of his skill and expertise. His good deeds have earned him a fantastic reputation worldwide, and many have called upon him for help. His latest case takes Jake to a small mining colony in Papua where a mysterious plane crash nearby has caused unrest in the workers and is disrupting operations. Can you help Jake unravel the mystery and return peace to this small civilization? Adventure awaits!

name: Noroi E: The Origin of Nightmares
description: You will have to make important decisions that will affect the outcome of the game and the fate of the main character. Will you be able to find a way to stop the curse and save yourself from the darkness, or will you fall victim to the darkness and join the ranks of the dead?

name: Mario: The Music Box Remastered
description:
Mario has heard rumours of an abandoned mansion that has been close to the Mushroom Kingdom for over a century. Any person who dares step into the mansion's rooms, never returns. Mario and Princess Peach were supposed to investigate the strange place but Mario decided to go alone. Inside the home he finds a strange music box that was playing by itself. Little did he know that a "harmless" music box would've caused the home to try to eat him alive. Find out as you comb through a dangerous mansion and find out the story of it's residents and how they met their fate.

Will you be able to guide the cheery hero of the Mushroom Kingdom back home? Or will he lose himself.

name: City Construction Simulator
description: City Construction Simulator is a simulation game which offers you the chance to become an expert in construction with the latest generation equipment. Your mission is to handle from beginning to end different constructions that you will be responsible for.

name: The Siege of Brimir
description: Play as an alien with super powers in frenetic battles against the army, destroy building, smash, fly and improve your character in order to annihilate humanity. They will try to stop you with their soldiers, F15, Giant mechas, warships or tanks, but it is going to be useless against your power.

name: The Scarlet Demonslayer
description: The Scarlet Demonslayer is an adventure game developed by Nuko Majin and published by Kagura Games.

name: Resident Evil Village: The Mercenaries - Additional Orders
description: The Mercenaries is a beloved fast-paced action-packed extra game mode from the Resident Evil series. Access the latest incarnation of this bonus mode after completing the main game, now featuring a first person perspective, and more.

name: Resident Evil Village: Shadows of Rose
description: The horror of Resident Evil Village continues in this additional chapter, which picks up 16 years later. Rosemary Winters, Ethan's daughter, struggles with terrifying powers. Rose's journey to break free of her curse takes her to a mysterious realm where past memories create a twisted world of nightmares.

name: Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions - Scaryfolks Puzzle Pack
description: Continue your adventure in the Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions with 9 new puzzles where fantasy arts meets scary folks characters in stained glass - FREE demo puzzle included!

name: The Last Craftsman
description: Get settled into the town of Gear Springs! Craft items for the townsfolk, gather materials, go fishing, and fight in card battles in the facility below the ruins.

name: Hi Color
description:
Hi Color is sending positive vibes to you!

Featuring thousands of exclusive pictures, and requiring no coloring skills, you will enjoy a calming and easy experience of coloring pictures you like in Hi Color.

name: Create your own monster
description:
'Create your own monster' is a game where you can create, color, interact and play with spooky and funny creatures designed within your imagination.

The game is available on iOS and Android, with different languages, including English, Spanish, French, German and Italian.

name: Fit Adventures Bundle
description: Three fantasy, sci-fi and steampunk games in one bundle!

name: Stitch.
description:
Stitch. is a casual puzzle game with embroidery on a numbered grid. The main objective is to fill in the levels' areas with no gaps to complete Hoops.

Stitch. lets you create beautiful embroidery patterns, by solving levels and Hoops of various difficulties and sizes. It's easy to learn, but hard to master!

Stitch up all the beautiful landscapes, plants, animals, objects, and more.

name: Adventure Llama Bundle
description: This bundle consists of two awesome point-and-click adventures from Epic Llama Games studio. A great offer for all fans of the genre!

name: Dark City: International Intrigue - Collector's Edition
description: An urgent message brings a world-renowned detective to a New York City engulfed in flames, but the deadly infernos are just the beginning!

name: Romancing the Kingdom
description: Choose your path through this graphic novel with dozens of erotic outcomes along the way. Save your progress and unlock the graphic and erotic chapters with your choices.

name: Mojito the Cat: Halloween Edition
description: Remember! Gravity is not an issue if you have the right mindset. Multiple characters Become a fierce shark, an angry bull, a migty rhino or a fluffy panda. With the Halloween DLC, you can also turn into a happy pumpkin, a scared ghost. Key features: - mi…
